name: Vanilla Sex Eau de Parfum
about: Fragrance Family: Warm & Spicy.Scent Type: Warm & Sweet Gourmands.Key Notes: Vanilla Tincture, Vanilla Absolute, Sandalwood.Fragrance Description: Vanilla Tincture India, an ingredient created specifically for Vanilla Sex, exudes a soft sensuality. Vanilla reveals a pristine glamour, warmed by mysterious florals and bitter almond essence. A timeless sandalwood quality mingles with enticing tonka absolute and an exquisite Ultravanil\ molecule..About the Bottle: Featuring opaque, cream-colored inner lacquering, a honey-tinted outer layer, and a caramel-hued plaque, the Private Blend bottle is an extravagant monument for any vanity/grooming area..About the Fragrance: Addictive by nature and glamorous by design, a captivating interplay of deep and bright vanilla notes stars in Vanilla Sex. It’s an unforgettable experience and an icon of sensual pleasure that’s far from innocent.
ingredients: Ingredients: Alcohol Denat., Fragrance (Parfum), WaterAquaEau, Tocopherol, Limonene, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Benzyl Salicylate, Hydroxycitronellal, Linalool, Coumarin, Benzyl Benzoate, Benzyl Cinnamate, Citral, Evernia Prunastri (Oakmoss) Extract, Farnesol, Benzyl Alcohol, Geraniol, Citronellol, Isoeugenol, Eugenol, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Bht, Benzoic Acid <ILN44751> Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting, stronger scent. .-After applying, avoid rubbing or dabbing skin. This breaks down the fragrance, causing it to wear off more quickly. .-If you prefer placing fragrance on your wrists, be sure to reapply after frequent handwashing, as this tends to rinse off the scent. .-Replace fragrance after 12 months. Expired perfumes more than a year old lose the integrity of the original scent... Eau de Toilette or Eau de Parfum?: .The difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. While EDT contains five to nine percent, EDP contains more, usually eight to 14 percent. EDPs, therefore, last longer and smell more intense.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am a HUGE vanilla fragrance lover.  I was so excited when TF released this.  But when I went to smell it in the store, I was confused and disappointed.  It had the strangest, lactic, porta potty type smell to me.  I couldn’t understand how it was even in existence.  Who would wear this?!  So every time I go into a Sephora, I try and give it another chance and let it sit on a tester strip for a bit and keep taking whiffs.  Nope.  Awful.  BUT THEN… I read some reviews about how you need to let it sit for a bit.  How it transforms.  I became curious, and decided to order.  I’m so glad I did!  Yes, at first the scent is overwhelming and slightly off putting.  But then something magical happens. It’s like the most sophisticated cupcake with sandalwood frosting.  If you like Dior Hypnotic Poison, imagine that mixed with some root beer and a very sweet breath mint.  It has a spiciness to it. It’s not your typical teenage gourmand type of sweetness.  It’s mature.  Unique for sure, and I have soooo many gourmand scents.  I love it now!!

reviews.review_title: Sensual and warm scent with insane longevity
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance was given to me by Sephora , free of charge for review purposes.  provided This fragrance’s longevity is nuclear. For sure an amazing value. Packaging is beautiful and refined.   Tom Ford's Vanilla Sex Eau de Parfum is a sultry and alluring fragrance that captivates the senses with its rich and decadent profile. Opening with a warm burst of vanilla, the scent quickly unfolds to reveal complex layers of creamy tonka bean and subtle floral notes, creating an inviting sweetness that feels both luxurious and intimate. The addition of spicy and woody undertones adds depth, making it a versatile choice for both day and evening wear.
Smells like urine .. been a while since I was repulsed by a scent. Smells like walking into public toilet in the summer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Luckily, I was gifted this so i didn’t have to PAY $405 DOLLARS for this perfume. Although it has a nice smell, lasts long, u really don’t need to spend this much money on a perfume. There are so many cheaper alternatives and personally i like the PHLUR vanilla skin perfume much better. I don’t understand how this is much different from other vanilla perfumes I’ve tried. There is definitely better ones out there. DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY.

reviews.review_text: So I think this is one of those perfumes where body chemistry comparability is absolutely necessary. Vanillas are tricky for me and the only ones that have worked are the kayali vanilla 28 and Skylar vanilla sky. This one smelled like hamster pee in me.

reviews.review_title: Tom Ford... you did it again!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I think Vanilla Sex is the perfect name for this perfume since it’s not your typical vanilla scent.  I bought this online without trying it first and I have to admit, the first time I sprayed it on my wrist the tabacco scent was too strong, I panicked!! But then it dried into my skin and magic happened… it turns into the creamiest, best, warmest vanilla, woody scent ever! This could totally be a unisex fragrance! I couldn’t stop smelling my wrist all day long! This perfume is long lasting in my skin. It’s just perfect! Oh and the bottle is so so pretty! Im happy to add this perfume to my Tom Ford collection!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was soooooo excited to get this full sized Tom ford perfume!!!! I’m not normally a vanilla scent girl but I was still open to using it. This scent is CRAZY strong especially with a bourbon scent, it’s just too much for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It is giving vanilla perfume for boomers and the generation before them that still have a very active life wink wink

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Is Ashton Kutcher going to pop out from behind my vanity to tell me I'm being punked? This scent was SO hyped, and for the price point, I was expecting something great. I love nothing more than a vanilla scent, and was hoping this would be my new go to for the cooler months. Things this does not smell like:  1- vanilla 2- sex  Things this does smell like 1- porta potty that has been overused 2- a urinal cake soaked in urine 3- a combination of the two  I don't know if I have a faulty bottle, or if the people who love this don't have the sense of scent and just don't realize it. Save your money, or at least PLEASE do not blind buy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Delicious Vanilla Tincture exclusively for Tom Ford Vanilla Sex. With hints of almond essence and endless sandalwood, spicy amber with a floral medium notes, with the high notes of Vanilla ultravanille molecule, giving an exciting tonka notes as the base notes of this delicious aroma. Lingering at the end and embracing the body with creamy notes that are thin and soft for the aroma connosseur. The bottle has a finish of caramel coating with almond color to it in an elegant bottle finish. Thin Amber spicy scent. High end product gives a complex price.  #influenster  #influenstervoxbox  #fragrance  #women  #perfume   #reviewer  #review  #sample  #beauty #sephora #tomford #vanillasex #almond #sandalwood

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love a good vanilla fragrance, but I am picky and find it tough to find ones that I actually like. I think Vanilla Sex is a clever name for this since there's nothing particularly remarkable about this scent, but it's sweet and warm and comforting. It's not too strong and I do wish the lasting power was a bit longer on my skin. I sometimes spritz it on before bed so it lightly scents my pillow. I am not sure it's worth the high price point, but I suppose that hasn't stopped me from buying two bottles so far.

reviews.review_title: Where have you been all my life?
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Tom Ford…. Wow. This is perfume is sooo nice and strong and lasts all day. I got a small sample and now saving to get a decent size bottle. It lasted all day and got compliments on it. It’s sweet yet matute.

reviews.review_text: Not for me.  With my body chemistry the scent comes off as vanilla with a very smoky and woody undertone. Just not what I like in a perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the sensual vanilla scent of the perfume. I receive so many compliments when I wear it. The scent makes me feel calm and sexy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I definitely recommend smelling this on your skin before purchasing. At first spritz it smells like root beer and kind of like play dough. After about 5 minutes, it turns into the creamiest, warmest vanilla scent ever. It smells like creamy vanilla pods, in my opinion, not vanilla extract. If you were a fan of the since discontinued Vanilla Lace from VS, you will love this. While some people find it basic, I find it to be elegant, classy and upscale. Is it overpriced considering it is so polarizing? Yes. But it is a very intoxicating scent. It's so hard to find a true vanilla fragrance that can be worn all year, day or night, in office or out. This one most certainly can. I smell no masculine tones in this whatsoever, just a very gourmand vanilla scent. No musk or sandalwood. Makes me think if you put all the vanillas in the world together, this would be the end result. Very different from TF, and I really do love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: At first, I hated the smell lol! Once it dries down it smells like purely vanilla. I feel like it does get sweeter the longer you wear it too. I'll occasionally mix this scent with another. But, definitely test it out before going with the first smell of it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this in the store and was instantly hooked. It had a mild but distinct, almost playdoh-like note followed by sweet vanilla, very nostalgic, very feminine. I obsessed over it for a couple of weeks and then finally purchased a bottle. Somehow my bottle smells completely different from the one I tried in store. My bottle has a much 'stronger' smell, an opening note of almond that quickly turns into a spicy, woodsy, much more masculine leaning scent with no playdoh-like note at all and the vanilla I can only smell after several hours of wearing it. I'm confused lol. It is still a great fragrance overall and I will continue to wear it and see what happens.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the smell of this perfume! It’s perfect for a night out of everyday wear

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This scent is a very elevated Vanilla. Not your typical spritz. I love this for evening or a night out & my boyfriend is a big fan as well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This one had to grow on me. I'm a vanilla gurl to the heart but this fragrance was a hard miss from me on first spray and wear. I ended up layering it with Kayali's Vanilla 28 first night. I didn't want to give up on this fragrance so I spent more time with it. I sprayed it on me and I've concluded that it's ok but I will always layer it for skin wear on me. The appreciation for me came when I sprayed it on my bathroom towel...instant luxury mood initiated!!. It's been 4 days and I still love going to the bathroom...ever took a boujie bathroom break?!?! I love it for bringing a mood to my living space. I'm gonna try the living room next!.. This was a gift to me, and I'm gonna be honest as say I'm glad I didn't spend my personal funds for this. BUT I do believe I've found a way to make it work for me. Considering price and my fragrance experience I would say it does NOT live up to the hype for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a full size bottle for review, was amazed at the elegance and simplicity in the packaging. The vanilla bean scent is very appealing with the underlying sandalwood leaving you drooling almost lusting over the person, it sure makes you want to bite them. I wore it around my partner and she wanted to stay sniffing me for minutes. It is definitely on the feminine side but a unisex scent. Very elegant smell. Would buy this as a gift for my partner so I could smell her all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful!! I love it and it lasts 10+ hrs on my skin I sprayed it in the morning then at night I could still smell it! When I first smelled it I fell in love definitely one of my favorites from his private blend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I agree with the reviews about it smelling bad initially and I’m glad I gave it a chance. It smells delicious once it dries down. Could not stop smelling my wrist all day where I sprayed to test it. Also good lasting power as it seems to be oil based

reviews.review_title: Nasty at first, But ends in BEST PERFUME EVER
reviews.review_text: I rarely leave reviews unles im complaining, but felt i should because of the other negative reviews. At first spray this smells like an almond cookie bomb went off...horrible like others have said and I was kinda mad I sprayed it on me instead of a tester at the store. After about 10min it dried to the best buttercream vanilla angel food cake smell I've ever smelled.  The smell reminds me of the original vanilla ice cream from Thriftys they sold in the 80s and 90s before changing the recipe. Smells similar to Anik Goutals Vanilla Essence. Smells very creamy and natural also similar to bath and body works vanilla essential oil perfume I wore in highschool in 1998. Lasted tell I washed my sweatshirt a week later and prob could have lasted longer. Tom ford fragrances last a longtime. Waiting to purchase during next VIB event. Great year round fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hated this on the first smell when I sprayed it on at the store. Up front it was chemically and powdery. On the drive home that I couldn’t stop smelling my wrist. Ordered online and love.    wrist after it settled.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells like the pink gum with the comics on the inside of the wrapper. Not amazing, but not bad.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This scent has taken over my soul. It has become the signature scent from my collection. When you think vanilla sex think of me. I love it so much price point is a little high but totally worth it in my opinion. It’s a mix of vanilla and spice and I’m a winter baby so it fits my personality so perfectly.  Now just to find a summer scent 🤔

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Received this complementary for review purposes. Honestly you can get this scent for a much cheaper price at bath and body works. Something like warm sugar cookie is what this smells like.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I never thought I would hop on the vanilla perfume train, but boy this product will really get you. It’s absolutely amazing! I’ve been wearing this every day since I received it and I don’t know if I can wear anything other than vanilla perfume now!   The packaging it arrived in was luxurious and really held up to the Tom Ford name. The box itself feels like a soft leather and then the bottle is a smooth glass. I’m very impressed with the packaging! You can tell they put as much thought into the presentation as the scent.   The scent itself is a sweet, warm vanilla that really wraps around you without being too overwhelming. You only need to spray a tiny amount of it onto your wrist, tap your wrists together and then tap them behind your ears. If you do anymore than that, it will get overwhelming because it is a strong scent so a little goes a long way! If you do use a little more, the scent will cling to you into the next day and your clothes which is fine with me because it smells amazing!   It is a very warm, inviting scent and I’ve gotten a lot more attention and compliments while wearing this. I think the long lasting wear, the packaging, and sultry scent make the perfume absolutely worth the price. It is obvious the company put a lot of thought and care into creating this perfume. I highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was straight up almond extract and very sweet. No complexity. A bit of play dough smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product from Influenster for my honest review. The video pretty much sums it up (see on influenster). I did not like this at all. Maybe from far away after it super settles, it is semi ok in the wind?.  However, other than that, it takes a certain taste to like this, I think. It was not for me, and I love a lot of perfumes. It smells of stale vanilla rubbed in some some kind of yuckysmelling lotion, and the scent is way too strong for what it smells like. I would skip this one sadly from Tom Ford, especially at this price point. 😌

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The scent is sweeter than I expected but it still smells good. I would recommend mixing it with a floral scent to throw off some of the sweet almond/vanilla scent. I personally don’t feel it’s worth the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The name is what attracted me, 2nd notes, last smell. BUT I find it so much better when I rub it in and warm it up. I know some say that changes the notes. Well, that must be why I love it so much. Warm. Vanilla. Sex

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It's sexy, super sexy and you can layer it with almost anything.  you have to spray it on to decide. Initially, my first sniff was unremarkable. However, I applied to my neck, and it became so divine & alive on my skin. My hubby fell in love with it, and it smells a bit like sex too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a scent for vanilla and gourmand lovers.  The top notes are very distinctly vanilla and cream (think melted vanilla ice cream!) and then perfume expands with a strong bitter almond, with a hint of a medicinal note. After about 15 minutes, it starts to dry down with a delicious nougat and honey smell. Personally, I love the complexity of this fragrance!  Not just the usual artificial smelling vanilla perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Smelt it and sprayed it smells like a public toilet room

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not to be overly dramatic but Play-Doh, urinal cake or porta potty; I don’t know which one explains the scent better. Smells like chemical vanilla for 2 seconds once sprayed and then changes to the smells mentioned above. Returned. I am shocked at how bad this Tom Ford perfume was a miss for me.   *I didn’t get this for free*

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Like most reviewers, I am a ride or die vanilla gourmand girlie. Vanilla Lace by VS was my go to for years (I even bought it in bulk before it was discontinued). I got a sample of this and I absolutely love it!! It's like Vanilla Lace grew up and got a big girl job. I'm only knocking off a star due to the price and the fact that it didn't make it through an 8 hour shift at work.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It smells like playdoh - are people only buying this for the name ?

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I knocked a star because the price is ridiculous. It's really long lasting on me. I sprayed it on before I went to bed and when I woke up I immediately smelled it.  To me it smells like creamy vanilla mixed with Coke. I understand the root beer float descriptions.  Overall I get a strong vanilla vibe.  I smell exactly what Tom Ford was saying. Different kinds of strong vanilla. I don't know if I would repurchase because the price is insane.

This is a great perfume I love the scent and I definitely recommend this if you want to smell like a vanilla fountain of frosting! I love it so much and I recommend it to all the vanilla lovers.Received d

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Very sexy indeed. I also detect coconut...very similar to Lavanilla coconut and slightly spicy like Dior Addict...it's for ladies who like vanilla and warmth. Lasts all day and it's lovely to catch whiffs of. Definitely for women... feminine sexy ness!

reviews.review_title: Love vanilla but not sure this is unisex
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was told this is a unisex scent but my fianc\e stated he would not wear it because to him it’s a very feminine scent. I love it and especially since my favorite scents usually have vanilla in them. I love hat it is long lasting but not over powering. I’m gotten so many compliments when I wear it. I would definitely recommend giving this scent a try. I don’t believe the scent is too feminine but can completely understand a guy not wanting to wear this scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was so shocked to receive this product from Influenster. I have never had a perfume that’s more than $150. I absolutely loved the scent. I’m usually more of a warm floral scent but this is such a classic and feels like a perfect go to for date nights. I will say it wasn’t as strong of a scent as I expected but the smell lasts all day and you don’t need more than one or two spritz to last the day. It’s definitely got a little bit of a spice behind the vanilla that makes it warmer and more of a night time or winter scent

reviews.review_title: Unusual Twist on Classic Vanilla Scent
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Tom Ford’s new vanilla scent is an interesting twist on the standard smell with a blend of Madagascar vanilla, delicate florals, and subtle spice along with a beachy coconut undertone. The coconutty undernotes can be a bit overwhelming upon first application, but it eventually fades out into a pleasing vanilla scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A captivating vanilla scent that exudes sophistication. Its blend of Madagascar vanilla, delicate florals, and subtle spice creates a luxurious fragrance perfect for any occasion. With long-lasting staying power, it's a must-have for vanilla lovers everywhere.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I smelled it in store and it reminds me of Febreeze whipped warm sugar and shea butter but much lighter. Pretty bottle but overall not worth the price tag.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is divine! From the packaging down to the scent. The scent is warm yet sexy, and doesnt have that gross artificial vanilla smell li. I love vanilla notes in perfumes, and this is the perfect balance of sweet and spicy. I will be adding this to my go to perfumes for sure. It also lasts all day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance exudes an elegant, mysterious and daring take on vanilla. It has an almond candy sweetness, that is not too sweet, just enough to round it out. A sandalwood and vanilla lover's dream!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to like this so bad, but it smells like medicine and chemically. It feels like the scent of alcohol wipes and Band-Aids - it’s almost a bitter almond extract sent for the first 30 min which fades to a nauseating vanilla

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So good!!!! I was not expecting it to smell this good because usually Tom Ford perfumes are a little bit too strong for me, but this one is so amazing, it smells so gourmand! For me, it lasted 1 day which was great

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Kinda reminded me of vomit. It’s very very bitter almond and the vanilla and floral notes don’t come through at all really. Just mostly the bitter almond. Picture eating stale almonds & that’s what it smells like

reviews.review_title: A must have in your perfume collection
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I personally don’t go for sweet scented perfumes because it hurts my head and usually the vanilla scent smells not so great. I enjoyed the scent of this perfume because it sticks (last on your body a while), I enjoy that I can layer it with my other favorite perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The initial smell of this is like rotting flowers in a funeral home. I didn't smell vanilla when I first sprayed. When it dries down, the vanilla comes out and smells decent. I can't get past the initial spray, and there are much better smelling vanilla perfumes that are not as expensive. Happy I tested in the store. I won't be purchasing it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: If I can give this 0 stars I would. This is the most atrocious thing I have ever sprayed on my body. I immediately smelled like a public toilet/porta potty. Honestly I am so appalled.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t understand the naming convention behind this perfume. What does sex have to do with it? It’s nothing but a gimmicky way to sell a product, and it doesn’t impress me in the least.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love most of Tom Ford’s fragrances but this one is horrendous. Starts out smelling medicinal like bandages and ends smelling like urine. U

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: i’m a ride or die vanilla/gourmand lover and this is a total miss. It’s very sharp and not pleasant at all. The almond is SO bitter it’s all i could smell. Def smell it in a store, you may be surprised how awful it smells

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance was not at all what I was expecting. It’s a complete let down. Smells like almonds that have gone off. Do not blind buy this, smell in store first.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells like artificial vanilla extract and alcohol. Good concept bad execution.

reviews.review_title: Could be a bit stronger for the price
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Ok so I was so stoked to review this Tom Ford Vanilla Sex perfume so as long as I give it my honest review. To start off I really want to thank Sephora and INFLUENSTER for including me in this study. My first thought was nah not true but when the box came I was stoked to open it although my gf claimed it. I can't wait until she is gone and or not paying attention and I put some on. I've done it before and have gotten lucky so I don't see why it wouldn't work now. Do we need to say more? Ladies know exactly what I'm talking about. The only downfall is that it's very subtle and doesn't really last a while day strong. So I would say for the price it could be a bit stronger. I love the vanilla tincture and the vanilla absolute but maybe that's what they we re aiming for all along was a very mild scent and not overpowering blast. So for the cost send the time it lasts I have to go with 4 stars but I do recommend to others.

As I read the other reviews I realized you either love this or hate this scent. Unfortunately I hated it from the moment I sprayed it on me. It lasted all day but dried down to a chocolaty play-dough smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Tom Ford is so good at selling fragrances that turn out to be the worst thing to get a whiff of. Smells like vanilla hand sanitizer from bath and beyond the one with the beads. Drys down to sweaty locker room doused in cheap body spray.

reviews.review_title: Def a scent for Gourmand Lovers
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is definitely a scent for the gourmand girlies. I wore it to the office and was told I smelled like sugar cookies lol. I do not understand the ratings unless they are from people who just don’t care for sweet scents. It is a very strong vanilla scent, and when it wears down a bit you can subtly smell the more sensual sandalwood. It projects and lasts all day, so no more than 1-2 sprays are needed. I personally prefer my sweeter scents to be a bit spicier so I layer it with amber scents myself. Overall really enjoy this, another great tom ford perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, notSure skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Yeah… no. I love vanilla scents but this one smells like spoiled milk with a hint of almond. It could work as a layer for something strong and more masculine but why bother when there are so many beautiful vanillas.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I didn’t smell any vanilla, it just smelt like very cheap hairspray :/

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Read the title ladies, do not blind buy perfume, I almost did, so glad I went to Sephora today just to smell it and let me tell you what, it really smells like rotting milk with a splash of cheap vanilla extract smell, what is up with Tom Ford fragrances?!

reviews.review_title: This has opened up my senses!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Tbh, I did not love the scent at first. It took awhile and now I LOVE it! It’s made a great addition to my small collection.  I usually go for clean scents, but this is the next best thing. It just takes a small spray, and the scent lasts till the next day which is a huge plus since I can wear it and know I won’t have to reapply.  It smells luxurious and sexy as all Tom Ford products. Thank you Tom Ford! You have opened up my senses to another level of possibilities!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: IMO it was so expensive .. and just smells like play dough

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’m not the target audience of this fragrance since I hate vanilla. I thought like other TF fragrances it would be layered so I’d like part of it. Nope! Every single layer is a cheap imitation vanilla scent after another. This smells like something rejected by B&BW.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume smells good but unoriginal. It’s a Vanilla Milk dupe with a way higher price tag. Its staying power isn’t great either. Pass

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Never have liked tom ford smells. This smells like playdoh. Worst smell ever. Way overhyped. Do not buy before smelling!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great vanilla scented perfume. It does not smell cheap and lasts a long time. I would definitely recommend for anyone who loves vanilla scented perfumes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Smells insane, hot, sexy, beautiful Tom Ford never fails

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'd like to spray this perfume directly to my skin. Because it interacts with my oils of my body. When I let the perfume dried down to my skin. It smells horrible has to be one of the worst smelling perfumes out in the market. I. Am just giving my opinion because everyone's body oils are different. I even tried sparring it on the card but no way. I think this perfume is getting a lot of hype that is overrated.. So a hard pass for me!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is an amazing fragrance from Tom Ford. The Vanilla is very present in a positive way turning the perfum very femminine and delicate. It is strong,  but in the notable way. I totally reccomend for anyone who is looking for a remmarcable and femminine perfum. The bottle is really beautiful and looks nice in my vanity 🥰

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This literally smells like Playdoh, and I’m beyond confused… Definitely does NOT smell like vanilla or anything sexy in any way. Brings me back to memories of being 4 years old in daycare

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have not been a huge fan of other Tom Ford but this one, I love. It sprays out strong musk and vanilla spice, but calms down into a soft vanilla. It does last majority of the day. It can be used as unisex. Its not heavy and musk usuallyis too strong for me. I definitely recommend and love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Most TF fragrances smell odd on paper but develop beautifully on the skin. Almond-vanilla scent on paper. On me it smelled like a truck stop bathroom, and the scent of old urine only grew stronger with time.

reviews.review_title: Love this scent it’s now in the top collection!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: “I received Tom Ford Vanilla Sex Parfum as a free sample in exchange for my honest review.” I absolutely love the warm cozy vanilla scent of this perfume! It’s a light and subtle scent but with a little kick to it! I am a Tom Ford newbie but after testing this scent I am now going to be intune. The scent lingers and lasts all day too! As the title itself says this scent made me feel all of too sexy for myself even. This is a must purchase as it can be worn unisex. So couples can definitely wear this scent together as one. I do recommend this scent for both sexes and especially for couples to go ahead and purchase and try it out. You will not be disappointed at all in my honest opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I hate to say that I don’t like this smell at all I try to get it on the best way the best I can but I just cannot, this feels like a weird smell not like something that I would wear no no no!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells like the dentist when you regret choosing the “vanilla” fluoride. The taste of the gloves, the powdery paper, sterile environment, and dusty smell. Do not.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this free product in exchange for leaving a honest review. This is by far the worst Tom Ford fragrance they have ever released. It smells like every cheap, synthetic vanilla you can get your hands on. In fact I would liken it to a cheap gas station vanilla car spray freshener. Only when it dries down to a skin scent does it become tolerable and even then you’d just rather not.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Is it just me or it smells like crushed bugs with a hint of vanilla? I thought it was going to be an intoxicating vanilla scent with some smokiness.  I hate it. it was nothing I would wear at all or smell on anyone else. I get that every nose is diff and also the chemistry with your body affects but this smells straight like crushed 🪳 juice in a moldy room with a hint of vanilla.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was honestly my first step into the world of Tom Ford fragrances. I am familiar with all his other fragrances, but had never bit the bullet and bought one myself. I was so happy to receive this new Vanilla Sex fragrance. the opening upon first spray, is an almond explosion. The entire fragrance reminds me of an almond biscotti. The dry down is a luxurious, straightforward woody vanilla that is pleasing to all. I've gotten so many compliments on this cozy fragrance. The bottle is stunning and looks incredible on my vanity. If you are a vanilla and gourmand lover, I would recommend this perfume!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: What a potent and warming fragrance.. So nice for winter.. I love wearing it alone and it's great to mix with my more masculine fragrances.. Exquisite notes last for hours of aromatic bliss.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the packaging and the bottle for the Tom Ford Vanilla Sex. However, the scent is way too strong. It's perfect for someone who is obsessed with vanilla, but not so much if you want something light. I will say that it definitely lasts a long time, though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's okay, it does smell like the name, hence the name _ex, in the opening little bit in the opening it is harsh for me. But the dry down is a bit better I guess, it is not worth the almost $400 price tag, but overall I'll give it a 3/10, the new Vanille Fatale is way better but this is just not worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Sorry but it’s a no for me. Once it dries it honestly smells like playdough. Love Tom Ford but this one is awful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not really a vanilla perfume but I get the almond scent! It’s not too strong so I can wear it and mot get a headache! Long lasting

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this perfume, it smells like real vanilla very sexy and bold. I love the packaging and the bottle is a good size to take everywhere I love the scent and it’s not overpowering, it just needs to last longer.

reviews.review_title: Expensive Vanilla- Not Sweet but Elegant
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is long lasting for me, the almond is a bit off putting at first but after it sets, it’s a beautiful vanilla and the almond cuts the sweetness and there’s a nice woodsy base. I love this and it’s an expensive canilla

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm not a Tom ford girlie. this is my first bottle. and it's SO GOOD. I wore it for a date night and still smelled it on in the morning. it smells like vanilla, not cloying, not too sweet. not artificial and not floral. just VANILLA. I had to beg for this bottle and it was well worth it, my man loved it too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This packing is stunning! It is sophisticated, classy and a gorgeous piece to display. I was excited to open it and wear it. It was sweet and spicy when first put on and I thought it was interesting, lots of almond flavor, but only a hint of vanilla initially.  After a few moments the vanilla fragrance came in with a touch of spicy/musky undertone. Its a really nice fragrance, the vanilla notes were not your normal sweet vanilla. Its similar to a few vanilla fragrances on the market today that are much less in price. It also  didn’t wear very long for me, after about 3-4 hours it became very faint and was only slightly fragrant where it was applied. Overall, this is a very nice fragrance but at a $395  price point, I’m not sure it is worth it, for me anyway. I am sure it would be perfect for others as its not terrible. It was only okay, I definitely wasn’t blown This packing is stunning! It is sophisticated, classy and a gorgeous piece to display. I was excited to open it and wear it. It was sweet and spicy when first put on and I thought it was interesting, lots of almond flavor, but only a hint of vanilla initially.  After a few moments the vanilla fragrance came in with a touch of spicy/musky undertone. Its a really nice fragrance, the vanilla notes were not your normal sweet vanilla. Its similar to a few vanilla fragrances on the market today that are much less in price. It also  didn’t wear very long for me, after about 3-4 hours it became very faint and was only slightly fragrant where it was applied. Overall, this is a very nice fragrance but at a $395  price point, I’m not sure it is worth it, for me anyway. It was only okay, I definitely wasn’t blown away. away.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is luxurious! From the packaging down to the scent. The scent is warm yet sexy. I love vanilla notes in perfumes and this is the perfect balance of sweet and spice. I will be adding this to my date night fragrance rotation!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received plenty of compliments on this fragrance. It’s fairly light and not overpowering and is versatile so you can wear it many different places. I also liked the packaging is sturdy and not easily bendable which protects the bottle.

reviews.review_title: A vanilla indulgence that can lean masculine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As much as I appreciate vanilla scents, the struggle to find one that can lean masculine is real. This fragrance really fills the niche with an almost animalic base that complements the vanilla and bitter almond. I did not pick up any florals throughout, but definitely some powder in the middle. I liken this fragrance to Armani Code Profumo, a favorite that has been discontinued.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Heavy on the almond notes. Light on the vanilla. No lasting power. Smell is reminiscent of petroleum jelly, play-dough, and Vaseline. It’s over hyped and underwhelming.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I dont understand the hype. overpriced bottle of meh. tobacco Vanille is a delight, but this was just vanilla, straight up not sophisticated or layered at all, it didn't last very long either.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Vanilla sex is just what it sounds like. In the opening you get vanilla and almond. As I've come to learn more about the brand it caters to the distinguished individual. This perfume is in line with that. Long lasting but for the mature but playful person. This is a unisex fragrance that can be paired with a lot and stand on its own. I'm glad to have been able to try it!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I went to go smell this at Sephora. It smells exactly like the vanilla lip smackers chapstick! I laughed to myself because it brought me back to elementary school in the 2000s. Not too special for me personally.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you want to be that girl that people always say  “omg you smell so good” then this is the perfume you want to get. It is literally the best vanilla scent ever. It’s sweet, it’s warm, you literally don’t wanna stop sniffing it. You only need to spray a little bit on yourself and you’ll be smelling like a freshly baked vanilla waffle all day 🤍 this sent will literally last all day. I got so many questions about what fragrance I was using the first time I put it on. Vanilla girlies, get it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm not really into vanilla scents but I was so intrigued when I smelled this perfume. It's soft, warm, and cozy! It does smell like vanilla but with a hint of like coffee or something! I love wearing this at night, after I shower. It last so long too! I'm so happy I was able to try this perfume, thanks influenster & TF!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’d give this zero stars if I could.  Beyond awful. It smells like melted plastic and cheap vanilla. It’s so bad that I can taste it after a small spray on my wrist.  It seems to last — so I guess there’s that.  Solid pass. It’s gross.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love the bottle! It smells like basic vanilla that I can get way cheaper. The smell only lasts about 3 hours then it just fades away. Do not recommend purchasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product is well packaged. It smells great inside the store. I actually never received my product so can’t tell a whole lot about it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance smells luxurious, sophisticated, and overall amazing. I was expecting more of the vanilla to stand out, but it has a heavy almond scent. The wear is incredible, and this is the perfect date night fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This fragerance is EVERYTHING! The delicious and sexy smell of smooth vanilla wrapped with a sophisticated, smoky undercurrent will have everyone asking who you are wearing and where they can get some. From the packaging to the scent itself, everything about Vanilla Sex is well crafted. The packaging is durable and with a color matching the contained scent. The bottle is thick and elegant, not likely to break and continues with hues matching the outer packaging and vanilla scent. This cologne can be layered easily without worry of overpowering the senses. I would recommend this for anyone looking to wow others.

reviews.review_title: Vanilla has never been so sexy... be prepared!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Being a huge fan already, I was very excited to receive the new Tom Ford fragrance. The scent is best described as a warm, sultry vanilla. I can honestly say that I have not received so many compliments on a fragrance in a very long time. Just to give you an idea of how much of a big deal this is, I work for Sephora. I tested this fragrance before I left for work. While I was at the store I was stopped five times! If you have been inside a Sephora you know that there is a lot of scents going on in there, so to be stopped is almost unheard of! Anyways, I love it! I wear it alone or I layer it with another fragrance. My favorite is to layer it with Tom Ford’s Lost Cherry! Delicious! Don’t let the sticker shock scare you away! A little goes a long way, it smells delicious on its own, and will breathe new life in your old favorites!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Tom Ford's Vanilla Flavor Perfume is a sheer delight. The rich vanilla notes create a warm, inviting scent that lingers gracefully throughout the day. The stylish bottle adds a touch of luxury, making it a worthy addition to any collection. A sophisticated fragrance that effortlessly balances sweetness and elegance. Highly recommended

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I didn't like the smell of this perfume at all. The vanilla is way too overpowering and it just doesn't smell good. I won't be using it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I already know that Tom Ford fragances last forever. I mean wash your clothes and you can still smell the fragance on them. This one is not the exception. You really can't go wrong with vanilla based fragances, I like that it's sweet but not overwhemingly so. It's elegant and perfect to wear during the cold months. I will continue to wear it, I have received several compliments every time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is long lasting and it’s not overly powerful! I would definitely recommend if you enjoy vanilla!

reviews.review_title: I wont make a special purchase
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The scent is strong, not very feminine and it doesnt last long. Being that it was Tom Ford, it disappointed me to the fullest. I was expecting a longer lasting and more feminine scent. Nothing I would go in store to purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is not your typical vanilla fragrance. This is not cloyingly sweet. It’s a very complex, deep, and comforting scent. With just the right amount of sweetness, warm sandalwood  to balance it out and the slightest hint of smoky spice, what you end up with is a deliciously sexy and complex fragrance that will delight and last for a long time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this perfume! It is vanilla forward, but the finish has a woody quality. I'm typically not a fan of vanilla perfumes because I find them too sweet, but this scent is not too sweet with the balance of vanilla, almond, and sandalwood. To me, this smells like Christmas morning. It lasts on me all day long, so I think the bottle will last a long time!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a solid eau de parfum with a solid sweet vanilla smell. Overall, the smell is somewhat comparable to other vanilla eau de parfums, but there is a subtle, sweet, yet calm vanilla scent to it, that I just can't put my finger on it. It lasts for the whole day, and doesn't leave any bitter smells upon application, or as the day wears on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of the best fragrances I’ve smelled in so long!!! I am not a sugary vanilla scent person but this perfume has layers!! Theres an over-note of vanilla but it’s not sickly sweet there’s a musky spice to it and I LOVE it! Doesn’t cause a headache either which is a plus. I just wish the scent lasts a bit longer but I don’t mind reapplying. Another positive is the Tom Ford quality, the packaging is very luxe which is a bonus!

reviews.review_title: Yes, it's as good as it sounds!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this item for free from Tom Ford and Influenster in exchange for my honest review.  Tom Ford Vanilla Sex EDP will be will be packaged firmly in the nice box shown in the photo I posted with this review. Pull the top off and you will reveal the beautiful clear bottle with cream colored Vanilla Sex. Now..what you are waiting for. How is that first spray? Definitely get hit with the Vanilla..but not in a bad way. The second thing that came to my mind was that it was a more feminine smell. Doesn't necessarily mean that I will not be giving it another try! With Tom Ford you may not like it the first time you try it. Give it another try and it can change your mind sometimes. The Vanilla Sex is a powdery vanilla smell with a hint of sandalwood. If you are looking for something different this is definitely the one for you! My wife sprayed this on before she left for work. I walked in the bathroom about an hour later and it was like she had just sprayed it! This is one where you grab your shirt the next day and you still smell it. It's a really pleasant smell..as long as you like vanilla lol. Now, let's talk about this $395 price for a 50ml bottle. Is it worth it?? I can't tell you yes or no on that question. I can tell you that a couple small sprays is all you need. I do highly suggest that you go and sample this before you go and fork out $400 on a bottle of this! Vanilla Sex isn't going to be for everyone. Would I recommend this?? Yes. Please sample first before buying though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After reading other reviews, I was hoping this would work well for me when I got it as a free sample for my Influenster box. Unfortunately, I found this so strongly vanilla that I couldn’t smell any other notes, even after it dried down. It was just a little too sweet and the other notes didn’t come through, so just wasn’t my cup of tea!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have an extensive scent collection and adding the new Tom Ford Vanilla Sex Eau de Parfum was a wonderful addition. I tend to lean towards both floral and bright scents as well as earthy and musk and this scent fit right in. It’s sensual, warm and sophisticated, perfect for the fall/winter season. The first prominent note is a warm almost bourbon vanilla and then the bitter almond and musky sandalwood comes through. The scent is smoky and glamorous. This is not your average vanilla sweet scent, it is deep, spicy, elegant and much more complex and elevated. The sandalwood essence along with the vanilla absolute really emphasizes that nutty sultriness. It’s well rounded and there’s a mysterious floral bitterness along with a sweet almost marzipan like scent that comes in right at the end. I loved the way it dried down and meshed with my body chemistry, the musk really came through after it settled into my skin. This perfume isn’t for everyone, just like its name, it is provocative, bold, and compelling. But even if you’re hesitant I would still give this a try. I personally love it, its scent unfurls the longer you wear it and is an experience in itself.  It’s neither feminine nor masculine but a perfect blend of the two embracing the lightness of the vanilla and spice of the sandalwood. The scent throw is decent and head turning and the lasting power is strong in the first few hours and then lingers to a light skin scent after 4-5 hours. Just like the scent, the bottle itself is elegant and modern. It looks so beautiful on my countertop and is a stand out amongst my perfume collection. Tom Ford Vanilla Sex is a deep, sultry, smoky and warm scent that will have you smelling as glorious and as sophisticated as you already are.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: There’s no doubt that this perfume smells purely like vanilla. It’s a very clean, one note scent — vanilla bean in its full glory. A little spray goes a long way and lingers forever. At first spray it was a little strong for me but as the scent dried down, it became this toasty vanilla that I kept sniffing. This would be a good one to layer with more interesting scents especially since it’s so purely vanilla.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Immediate reaction was Wow, this is an interesting scent! And quite frankly I didn't like it right away. Warm vanilla notes welcome you but then there is a strong kick of spice. Definitely try it once, twice, and maybe even three times before saying nope because you will be surprised! TF you just showed me to be patient and slowly fall in love with your fragrance. Once it settles into the skin it becomes an exquisite, sensual, and sophisticated essence. Definitely not ordinary!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was very excited to receive the Tom Ford Vanilla Sex fragrance for review from Influenster. Right away I really liked the packaging and the bottle. They look modern and classic at the same time. The vanilla scent is warm and sweet without being overpowering. I think a little goes a long was but that the scent is also subtle. I enjoyed the order notes of spices and almond as well. One of my least favorite things about the fragrance is the name. To me it doesn't fit the fragrance best. I wouldn't say it's an overly sexy smell and the term vanilla reminds me of something being boring. It's marketed as being a unisex fragrance but I think it is more feminine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Thank you Tom Ford and Influenster for this complimentary perfume, in order to give my honest review. I unfortunately was disappointed with this perfume. I was hoping for a more well rounded vanilla perfume. It does smell good but more in a vanilla icing way. Thats all I could smell. I prefer vanilla blended with other scents to use it as a perfume. To be completely honest, I think I expected more from a brand like Tom Ford. However, as always the bottle and packaging is very luxurious, aesthetic, and high quality!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Almond marzipan is all I smell . There’s a sort of nutty musk supported by the muted vanilla notes that make it unique. Doesn’t project much. And only last 2 hrs. I like it but not love it. Paired with other fragrances makes for a interesting layer. But alone it’s too soft to really pick up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love the smell but it’s strong to me.  I love the vanilla smell. My husband likes the smell but agrees that’s it’s over powering.  One spray and it’s good to go!  I also believe it lasts all day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This scent immediately gives me Renn Faire Elf vibes! Teasing of vanilla, almond, and bonfire it’s the perfect blend of warm and sensual. Would definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been on a lifelong quest for the perfect perfume and I've found it in Tom Ford's Vanilla Sex. It's a splurge, but trust me, it's worth every cent. The scent is a sophisticated take on vanilla - it's deep, luxurious, and just subtly sweet. It doesn't overpower but instead, adds a layer of intrigue and elegance to your presence. What I adore about this perfume is its adaptability. It's my daily confidence booster for work, yet it seamlessly transitions into a seductive evening scent. There’s something about it that feels both comforting for day wear and captivating for nights out. The longevity is another plus. A small dab in the morning, and its enchanting aroma stays with me all day. It's not just me who loves it; I'm constantly getting asked about my perfume. Vanilla Sex by Tom Ford isn’t just a perfume, it's a statement. It has become an indispensable part of my daily routine and undoubtedly, my favorite fragrance of all time. For anyone contemplating this purchase, I say it's a decision you won't regret.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very nice smelling perfume, it’s definitely very vanilla forward but has a powdery set smell once it’s dried down.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love! I received this perfume free for my honest review. I typically do not like sweet smelling perfumes I gravitate toward floral scents but this scent was sweet but not overwhelming. It’s very light  sweet smelling. I wear it everyday and would define at LY but again. Worth the price tag. smelling
