reviews.review_text: At the beginning the parfume felt like too much but after some time I started to fell in love with it. And I am not even into vanilla smell. But this one definitely got me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It’s a milky powdery vanilla. For me is more feminine and I love it, the bitter of the almond just makes it perfect. I have used almost every single day since I got it and it’s perfect, it’s long lasting and I’m obsessed jejej

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ooooo Tom Ford did GOOOOD with this! I'm in love with this scent. It has a masculine vanilla scent but still has that soft edge to it to give that floral glamour scent. Yes yes yes a million times yes! & the bottle is so cute

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a complimentary product. I really liked the Tom Ford Vanilla Sex Fragrance. It's a very feminine light fragrance that lasts all day. It has a warm toasty vanilla scent that is comforting and a bit nostalgic. I found the formula to be very lightweight and smooth. I found the packaging to be beautiful and sophisticated. Overall I found the perfume to be the ideal winter scent that is very fitting for both night and daytime wear. I received several compliments while wearing this scent, and it will be a perfume I will repurchase in the future.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: First of all, I love Tom Ford. This however missed the mark exponentially. I don’t know why but it smells like playdoh with a HINT of vanilla on me? Could be someone else’s thing but I didn’t fall in love with it. BBeautiful packaging as always

reviews.review_title: Game changer for vanilla scents forever
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Consider me permanently obsessed with this fragrance. I’ll always go for a vanilla scent first but this was a vanilla perfume on fire. One or two spritz will not only go a long way, but it lasts all day. It exudes sex. Perfect for a date night. Absolutely worth the investment. I’m constantly complimented on this perfume. Not overly sweet either. THIS IS A MUST HAVE.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: True warm vanilla ascent that is not overpowering. It is lightweight and very gentle..has some almond and oral notes as well. I received this complimentary from Tom Ford and Influencer in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The scent definitely is delicious. I'd describe it as sweet and alluring.  The initial spray smells of sweet vanilla ending with a hint sandlewood. Vanilla Sex, in my opinion, can be both feminine and masculine, making it a great scent for everyone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this scent!! At first whiff i smell the vanilla and some spicy (in a beautiful and Feminine way) mixed in with it, i believe it is the sandalwood and something else i cant name but i cant stop wanting to smell myself. It makes me feel like i should be on a romantic fireside date. This is a grown and sexy drive the people wild scent. Definitely not just your ordinary vanilla scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I find this quite potent upon first spray. One spray is plenty but may lack some longevity. Very sweet vanilla and sweet mint, the feeling of rich almost smothering honey. A little sickening for me even with only one spray!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: girrlllll, this is luxury!!! literally everything about this makes you feel like royalty. the fragrance, the bottle, EVEN THE TISSUE PAPER that it came with. omg, i am in love. it's definitely expensive and way out of my budget, but i would buy it just for the experience. the fragrance itself is not what i usually wear. its very sweet and smells like root beer float at first lol, BUT i was told that i smell delicious. one of my favorite things is that it is unisex, so you could share this with your partner, although i doubt you would want to ;) my only qualm with is that it didn't last as long as i wanted it to. it was on maybe 3-4 hours when i stopped smelling it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this complimentary product courtesy of influenster and Tom Ford in exchange for my honest review. At first glance, the bottle is modern and elegant, the name, well, it does come with high expectations. In full  transparency, I typically enjoy clean, fresh scented perfumes more so than sweet scents. Upon the first few sprays, I was overwhelmed. The scent is bold and rich in vanilla notes. However, in time tones down and you begin to smell the warm, soft masculine sandalwood notes that pair nicely with the rich vanilla notes. In time, I learned that a little goes a long way, and with that, only using a spray or two is just right. It has outstanding staying power. It is very versatile, as it could compliment a woman or a man. So the question is, does it live up to its name? It has my vote! Both delectable and enticing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Is basically the essence of feeling like a vanilla cake. It's like a warm hug with a hint of sweet vanilla goodness. The scent lasts forever, and every time I wear it, someone asks, What are you wearing? It smells amazing without even trying. Love, love, love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely loved this scent. I am generally NOT a fan of vanilla based fragrances. This one however, got me. I received this item in exchange for my honest review, and thats what youre getting. Its sensual n sexy but also mellow. And the longevity? Oh man! After 8 hours of working I was still getting compliments on my perfume!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Let me just say wow I love this scent. Is it revolutionary? No, but it sure is nice to have in the fragrance rotation. The scent to me is very dimensional, it opens with a very strong projection of almond blossom (too me) which lasts for a good hour or so before fading to the middle note. The middle note to me give off a boozy vanilla nutmeg vibe (adore desert esc fragrance) before fading into the base of just creamy sandalwood-esc vanilla. The base notes remind me of vanilla fields but this is so much better. This can definitely  be worn on its own however it’s even more divine if paired with fruity type fragrances which makes a custom fragrance unique to you. It’s definitely a cooler weather scent as being in Florida I think with the humid summers it might be a little too sweet.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was not sure what to expect with this scent combo. The vanilla is the perfect combo with the sandalwood. It is a smooth sensual smell without being overpowering

reviews.review_title: Vanilla Sex: A Seductive Fragrance with a Modern T
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried out the Tom Ford Vanilla Sex perfume and I must say, it’s a fragrance that’s worth every penny. It’s not your typical vanilla scent, but rather a warm gourmand fragrance that has a seductive earthiness to it. The fragrance is backed by the bitterness of almonds, the softness of mysterious flower petals, as well as the smoothness of sandalwood. It’s a modern vanilla perfume that has a complex and elegant aroma. As someone who loves the soothing beige-toned aesthetic, I was drawn to this perfume. It’s perfect for intimate date nights and elegant occasions when you don’t want your perfume to say “hi” before you do. However, since this is a skin-scent, it may not be quite as bold or long-lasting as one may expect (especially for the higher price point). All in all, Vanilla Sex is a total win that’s dreamy, complex, and elegant. It’s a well-timed launch for those who crave a bit of the “quiet luxury” aesthetic within their fragrance wardrobe. I hope you find this review helpful! 😊

reviews.review_title: A must for those who love Vanilla
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this fragrance for free as part of a promotion in exchange for a honest review.  I am a fan of Tom Ford especially Soleil Blanc and Soleil de Feu. However, this was a nice change from my traditional TF fragrances. First, the packaging is chic and enticing. Next, the fragrance is really nice, its reminiscent of Vanilla extract. It lasted throughout my 8 plus hour work shift and seemed to agree with the chemistry of my body.  I was also able to layer this fragrance with another gourmand fragrance for a more sultry combination. Overall, its amazing, its a great addition to my current collection and I would purchase this product in the future.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This scent is very light and gentle. I find the scent to have a vanilla nutty scent and really enjoy it. The scent lasts all day. The bottle and perfume are very pretty. I would recommend this scent and purchase again. Its a most fitting scent for winter and fall or all season!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a complimentary 50ml bottle of Tom Ford Vanilla Sex Eau de Parfum from Influenster for my honest review.  As a person who typically doesn’t care for fragrances where vanilla is the top note, I found the scent to be initially overpowering but transformed into a seductive caramel vanilla that lasted pleasantly lasted all day into night.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When I first got the perfume from Influenster I was worried that the scent would be overly gourmand/sweet and that I would smell like the artificial vanilla that many vanilla perfumes tend to lean. However, I was pleasantly surprised when I first sprayed it, and after having used it for the last few weeks , the scent continues to grow on me. On initial spray you get an immediate burst of almond, similar to the smell of marzipan mixed with vanilla. As it dries down you get the more sensual vanilla and sandalwood. I didn’t pick up on any floral that it claims to contain in its middle notes. Overall It has a decent projection and lasts about 8 hours and longer on clothes. I’ve had a lot of friends and coworkers tell me I smell cozy, which really plays well given the colder season we’re in. Overall if you’re looking for a more elevated take on vanilla perfume, then definitely give this one a go.

reviews.review_title: A Must Have in Your Collection
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Tom Ford's Vanilla Sex perfume is a true masterpiece that has become a staple in my fragrance collection. The enchanting combination of vanilla, warm woods, and subtle florals creates an irresistible scent that is both alluring and sophisticated. What I appreciate most is its longevity – the fragrance lingers throughout the day, constantly drawing compliments. It's a perfect balance of sweetness and sensuality, making every wear a delightful experience. If you're looking for a fragrance that exudes luxury and leaves a lasting impression, Vanilla Sex by Tom Ford is an absolute must-have.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm so grateful to Influenster for receiving the Tom Ford Vanilla Sex in exchange for my honest opinion. I am no expert when it comes to describing fragrances by any means, but I know what I like and I really like this scent. The main ingredient, Vanilla Tincture India, is soft and sensual without being obnoxiously overpowering (It just come out strong at first but settles down quickly).  And let's not forget that gorgeous bottle that comes in. This is definitely my favorite fragrance of all time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review.   I have to say this perfume is one of my favorites. I usually don’t love vanilla scents but this is the perfect amount of warm and spicy that isn’t overbearing. It stays on your skin and clothes all day and is perfect for everyday use or an evening out.

First impression is pretty good. Smell some almonds and vanilla. But progressively becomes more and more vanilla. I am a fan of vanilla but this just smells too sweet. Would have liked some more spice or character in the fragrance, something to cut from the vanilla. With that being said, it still smells quite good. Probably leans more feminine than unisex. Surprisingly long lasting compared to typical Tom Ford standards.

reviews.review_title: Well executed fragrance. Try it in the cold!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was a difficult scent for me. Let me first start off and say, vanilla is not my favorite scent. I love it in a base, but not as the main event. That being said, this one is not bad. I tried it in both warmer and colder weather. In warm weather, it was overly sweet in a gourmand sense. I would have described it as a very authentic vanilla, reminding me of vanilla extract. That was all I smelled in the heat. Now I tried it again in colder weather, and it was so much better. It starts out with a very robust, thick vanilla smell. It also has a plasticky (in a good way)/almond vibe to it. It then thins out to a little woodiness in the background. This is about an hour in and this is my favorite part. It then settles into a tonka/sandalwood/vanilla trio. Overall, I’d say that this fragrance does really good for what it is: a vanilla centric fragrance. If you like vanilla, then I think you will like this. If you are like me and don’t care for it as much, then you may appreciate that it is a well executed fragrance but just not for you. The projection is good for the first 2 hours, then stays close only for those you are speaking to or standing next to. It stayed on my skin overnight and I could still pick it up when I woke in the morning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Being a huge fan of Lost Cherry, I was super excited that a Vanilla was coming out. This was a blind buy. One spray was all it took. Smelled like cat urine to me. Just terrible

reviews.review_title: Tom Ford Top of the Line
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: OH my my my. I got this free from Influenster to test. what a blessing packaging sturdy and lasting the smell is some of the best vanilla note I've ever encountered.  This is an awesome perfume.

reviews.review_title: Very strong, deep and intense with many different
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This Tom Ford scent, Vanilla Sex, has a very deep and powerful scent. I found it to be very intense with many subtle notes and fragrances. The initial scent you are introduced to is a deep and warm vanilla with a hint of spice and a sneaky splash of an almost sweet, unburnt, tobacco smell. Just a small amount goes a very long way. I found this to be very overpowering at times if too much was used, one or two sprays at the most is more than enough. I would recommend this parfum.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wasn't expecting something too good given how relatively disappointed I was in the Electric Cherry, but this is...  So nice and pretty! It's like an adult version of a vanilla bakery.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My wife absolutely loves the Tom Ford Vanilla Sex perfume, and I love when she wears it.  It is not too overpowering, and lasts for a long time.  There is a sweet vanilla scent that is just right.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm not much a vanilla person anymore but I do like this scent it's a scent that on me the longer it layers the better it smells even though it does not last a super long time it's not so much vanilla as it is the bottom notes but you do get that hint of the vanilla as far as price point it is way too expensive to be purchasing if you are a vanilla girl.. definitely not worth the price

reviews.review_title: Subtle vanilla scent that grew on me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I delayed my review because I wanted to give an honest one after trying a few times. I will say this definitely grew on me and I like how it smells on me. Smelling it in the bottle I was unsure if this would work for me but after wearing it I completely changed my mind. I don’t typically gravitate towards vanilla scents but this one is subtle yet clean. I would absolutely recommend this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Like any Tom ford perfume, very strong vanilla scent. It last for many hours. Smells very good, high end. I’ve tried many Tom ford perfumes and all of them are very good!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this parfum from Influenster and Tom Ford in exchange for my honest review. Upon first opening this fragrance, I took great satisfaction in seeing how lovely the packaging is. I think it was perfectly done for a perfume that is unisex such as this.  When using the parfume, I did notice the vanilla and slight floral at first. However, after some time, the sandalwood notes came through and made for an exquisite addition to the scent.  When wearing this, I did notice it had great longevity. I could spray it on me in the morning and I was still smelling it at dinner time. This has become my go- to fragrance for fall and winter time. I most definitely will be purchasing again.

reviews.review_title: Almond extract transitions into root beer
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance opens with a burst of almond extract.  Whiffs of vanilla and cherry are front and center.  Very quickly, the blend of notes combines to create a scent that smells exactly like root beer.  It even has this effervescent quality that perfectly encapsulates this soda.  For the rest of this fragrance’s lifespan, the scent does not shift further and root beer continues to be what emerges.  The floral notes never make an appearance.  The initial spray leans feminine due to the sweetness of the vanilla and cherry pairing, but as the sweetness mellows and it morphs into a steady root beer scent, it becomes more unisex.  The name Vanilla Sex is very fitting because, like the colloquial phrase, this fragrance is simple and reliable.  Despite having many notes, the end result is not snobbish or complex.  Beyond the first spritz, the scent is consistent so you know what to expect no matter when it is applied.  But don’t be fooled; it’s a powerhouse and its strong projection lasts over 12 hours on the skin.  This will be an all year round, everyday fragrance for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I fall in love with this more each time I use. Such a privilege to test this Tom Ford’s fragrance. This is a complex fragrance. It has a very subtle vanilla smell with underlining almond scent. I can smell the almond very clear in addition to vanilla. It is sweet, but not too sweet. If you like vanilla smell, this is a next level, in my opinion. Smell is long lasting and it doesn’t change in my skin (fragrance tends to change smell in my skin, not the case here). The bottle is the classic Tom Ford style, light brown with whine undertone just makes the color of the bottle is beautiful and classy. So chic! The price is a bit steep, but it is consistent with Tom Ford’s prices and this is an amazing fragrance!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is well packaged, It looks amazing before even spraying it!  Once you spray it, the smell takes over and smells amazing! It has the perfect amount of scent and last awhile.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is really sickeningly sweet imo. On me it smells like that plastic baby doll smell, and a hint of condom. I hope it’s just me. Generally I think there is too much vanilla to make a fragrance out of and I feel like Mr. Ford may be trolling a bit with the name and smell combo. Might work for you but definitely not for my chemistry. The bottle and packaging though, always killer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

It's one of those perfumes I'm not as big of a fan of right after you spray, but it settles and lasts very well. The packaging and bottle are nice and classy. I like the scent and would recommend... but that price point.. sheesh.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Overall, the perfume is good. It has a nutty and strong scent to it. A bit overwhelming if you are not into those types of scents.

reviews.review_title: Classic base or perfect layer scent
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Vanilla Sex is such a classic parfum that I enjoy wearing it alone and receive many compliments, but when I layered and combine this scent with other warm and sweet scents it’s the perfect addition. While not be cloying or abrasive, the 3 different vanilla combinations is also short of leaning artificial and candy like. What more could you ask for? Nutty notes embrace the middle scent layers and dry down to a subtle sweet and floral linger. It’s a great daytime scent on its own or spray it before adding a spicy, warm, or sweet scent on top for a unique comforting dry down. Autumn and Winter help this scent shine, I can’t wait for warm weather and to experiment layering Vanilla Sex with different fresh scents.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

To my surprise, it was actually amazing! The vanilla is very strong, but not sweet at all, which is what I don’t like. My husband also doesn’t usually like when you have it really really liked it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got to try this through Influenster, and I absolutely loved it. Tom Ford Vanilla Sex perfume is a comforting scent that reminds me of home every time I use it. I also get complemented on it often.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This really is a great version of a grown up Vanilla fragrance. It’s like I would describe - a sexed up version of vanilla. Not boring like the name vanilla sex implies. It smells beautiful in the bottle and has lasting power. However, my chemistry doesn’t seem to match this fragrance as it just smells like a barnyard on me. I love TF products and will continue to recommend them, but this was something that smelled very different on my skin bs the bottle.

My first Tom Ford product; the smell of warm sweet vanilla with a light musky undertone makes it gender neutral depending on one’s own opinion. Either way, it has a long lasting smell that has received compliments from women and is envied by men. I definitely recommend the purchase!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: Give it a chance, it may change your mind!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I took a leap of faith and blind bought this. I have yet to find a TF scent that I didn’t (at the very least) like and have found several that I adore so I figured this one would follow suit. The first time I put it on, I was shocked and sad.  The initial scent was not pleasant to my nose.  It smelled heavily chemically and unpleasant. Oh no!  Over the course of an hour or so, I kept going back and sniffing myhe pulse point on my wrist and as the scent mellowed and developed, I was left with a lovely light almond-y fragrance that I soon realized that I actually really liked.    IMO, the scent doesn’t carry beyond my personal space and I am okay with that. What it does do is stay close to me and last a really long time. Yes, it gets fainter with time, but 10 hours later I could still smell it on my skin.  I wouldn’t suggest that anyone blind buy this one. It’s definitely a scent that you should try first and for sure don’t judge it upon your first sniff. It’s a lovely scent once it dries down and develops.

reviews.review_title: Smells like fall and winter in a good way!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this complementary from Influenster for an honest review. I wasn’t sure about this perfume at first. But I’ve grown to love it and the scent lasts all day. My daughters and mother in law however loved it from day one. It’s becoming a staple that I wear pretty often now. I definitely recommend picking this up if you have the funds. The price is why it’s getting 4 vs 5 stars.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_title: If you love vanilla it’s 3.5 outta 5 for me!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Ok girls.  This one hurts me.  When I saw in my email that I was getting Tom Ford, I practically stopped breathing.  I couldn’t believe I was lucky enough to be chosen.  I’m still super happy and grateful.  However, I need to be honest and reveal that I hate vanilla smells.  I despise it.  Every now and then I’ll indulge in a popular item to see what the hype is.  So I’ll start with my pros.  This is different.  Very much vanilla extract and almonds.  It’s not a sweet sugary type of vanilla smell.  Personally I find that refreshing.  Two sprays and you’re set for half the day.  No jokes, no smokes.  It lasts FOREVER!  I love getting compliments from others saying they can smell me regardless of how I feel about vanilla smells in general.  You can tell this is LUXURY baby.  It sprays so evenly, probably because the nozzle gives you a very fine soft misting.  It hits different from the other bottles I own.    My only con is that I hate vanilla.  After using it for a few weeks I find that layering it with your other favorite vanilla scents can really help to add a more sweet or musky layer of smell.  I only took off 1 star bc I personally don’t like the smell, but it’s still impressive.  I can totally understand why people gravitate towards these Tom Fords fragrances bc they are without a doubt luxury!  I’m so happy to have something like this in my collection.    I received this product as a free sample in exchange for my thoughts.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: If you're looking for an everyday all day fragrance this is a must have! It's lightweight not spicy/musky whatsoever! This is a vanilla scent that carries mysterious floral notes, tonka absolute, sandalwood essence, and a beautiful almond scent! It's so sexy and not abruptly strong! This will last me all day throughout the next morning on my skin, it's my go to fragrance for 2024!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Totally not my cup of tea. Doesn’t smell like vanilla at all. Doesn’t remind me of sex either. I love vanilla so I smelled it at the store and was disappointed. You have to smell it before you buy it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: Tom Ford's Vanilla Sex awakens the sensual pleasures with quality vanilla tincture from India; Also adding vanilla and enticing tonka absolute. It also provides warmth with bitter almond and sandalwood. A must for gourmand lovers.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: went to the store to smell this…me and my friend both agreed it smells like..almonds and play doh combination

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ok let me preface this review as I would give this one a solid 3 for me. Why you may ask? Simple, I generally am very picky on both sweet forward frags and also vanilla scents. Also no beating around the bush, this is a very expensivo perfume. So I think you should try this before you blind buy. But I think any of the niche line Tom ford should probably be tried before a blind buy.  Now with that said, I think this smells very good. I really think this is getting way too much hate. This is a vanilla bomb. The vanilla is the start of the show, with different notes of vanilla coming from the mid and base notes. The top notes is a nice touch of bitter almonds with which pairs well with the sweet and almost boozy flavors of the vanilla. Almost like really good bourbon vanilla extract.  I think it’s a true unisex scent. Funny enough I have had one person say it’s too manly and another say it is too feminine. Both were two separate females who said those remarks. I think this is a good performing scent, very good longevity and decent sillage. Really like the color of the juice, and makes it look even more beautiful and appealing looking at the bottle and presentation.  I have to give this one at least a 4 as this is probably the best vanilla flavor I have smelled. It is not super my cup of tea nor is the price something you are getting for a good bang for your buck. But just like most of Tom Ford niche line, you are getting somewhat natural excellent quality scents which are definitely unique and should be respected. If you love the notes of this scent I think you would like it very much.   In case you have not read the reviews, a lot of hate on this one. I definitely think it is unwarranted, but again more of a reason to try in store or buy a sample/ decant before buying a new bottle. Haters going to hate, but I give this a thumbs up on smelling dang good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It is like a warm hug. The vanilla is wonderful and had very warm scent perfect for the winter days where you want to feel cozy. But there is still that sexy twist that is hard to describe

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve received Tom Ford’s Vanilla Sex perfume in exchange for my honest review, and it's nothing short of captivating. This vanilla-scented perfume is a delightful symphony of warmth, softness, and enduring charm.  The fragrance gracefully unfolds with a subtle sweetness, creating a comforting and inviting aura. Its warmth is like a gentle embrace, making it perfect for both everyday wear and special occasions.  What truly sets Vanilla Sex perfume apart is its impressive longevity. The scent lingers throughout the day, gracefully evolving and maintaining its allure without becoming overpowering.  In my opinion, this perfume is a 5-star masterpiece for anyone seeking a vanilla-scented perfume that seamlessly blends sophistication, warmth, and longevity. It has become a staple in my fragrance collection, and I highly recommend it to those who appreciate the finer notes of life.

I think this is someones signature scent, but the bitter of the almond is a little too much for me. On the big postive is one spray is more than good enough to apply and noticeably smell it. All in all I think this would have been a 4 star for me if there was more vanilla, like a delicious almond sugar cookie.

reviews.review_text: First impressions were not what I expected, I can’t smell the vanilla 100% it smells much more like almond sweet almonds it does smell good but I can’t say it’s the best vanilla perfume when it doesn’t smell like vanilla at all.

This is one of the worst vanilla fragrances I have smelled in a long time. The almond is SO overwhelming and bitter that it ruins the whole thing. I barely get any vanilla at all. I have not met a person who likes this one. Big miss for TF.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: man they just don't make them like they used to... the reaction i had from smelling this was so visceral and upsetting. It turns rancid on the skin. Worst perfume ever congrats tom ford

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The scent is so good. I feel like a lot of scents where vanilla is the focus tend to be heavy and overwhelming. This one is deliciously sweet but delicate while still lasting a very long time. The bottle looks so elegant and pleasing. The only thing I'm not a fan of is the name-I believe they could have picked a classier name.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Has a painfully strong urine note that dries down into powder, cheap vanilla extract, and burnt rubber. Disappointed in Tom Ford’s quality these days.

reviews.review_title: A must have in my routine!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really loved this perfume it’s perfect for the season and yess I was obsessed!! The packaging was amazing it feels amazing in my skin!! And yes I will buy it again and use it again!! Thank you so much Influenster for making me try this perfume! And this was a gift/ sample from Influenster

reviews.review_title: Way better vanilla scents for a better price
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Immediate no. Smells artificial. This is NOT the quality of fragrance you expect from Tom Ford, especially at this price point. Vanilla is one of the most common scents. You can get an incredible vanilla scent for a fraction of the cost that smell so much better. Vanilla musk scent oil is $15 and smells way better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It smells like I rolled around in a bakery. I expected something more complex and spicy, but it did not deliver.  At least it’ll look pretty on my dresser!   I received this product for free

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was good. It smelled nice and warm and definitely has a pretty vanilla scent. However, you can really get the same thing anywhere else for so much less. It didn’t strike me as remarkable, it’s essentially a basic vanilla

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was very skeptical about this perfume, but was pleasantly surprised! I was worried it was going to be super sweet vanilla, but it actually has a very nice vanilla almond smell. The price is a little steep so I will use it sparingly! But I really enjoy this perfume! ￼

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Notice that the only good reviews are from people that got the product for free to review it. They're lying because they theyre eithet blinded by excitement for getting a free product or they just want to keep getting more free stuff. This STINKS. Tom Ford has been disappointing in his recent releases, which have been fragrances that lack performance and or mediocre scents. This one smells like spoiled Vanilla Extract mixed with some sort of bathroom cleaner. I can't describe it but it's unpleasant and I can't understand how anyone would walk around wearing this. This gives Pepe Le Pew vibes. And for it to cost almost $300 is insane, Tom Ford needs to stop it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to try this but it was so disappointing. It smells like a kids perfume. It’s so sickly sweet and not at all what I was expecting. It also barely lasts on my skin. For the price point this is not worth it IMO.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As always Tom Ford comes through for the win. This is absolutely amazing! It’s such a soft elegant fragrance. Perfect for day or night. Highly recommend if you love a rich scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love vanilla scents and it’s usually pretty easy to win me over with one. But this is the weirdest, cheapest smelling vanilla scent I have ever tried. Definitely a no for me.

reviews.review_title: Unveiling the Perfect Blend of Vanilla and Almond
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely delighted with this gem! The vanilla with a subtle almond twist is a winner. It's got weight without being cloyingly sweet—perfect for those nights out when you want to make an impression. I reserve this fragrance for special occasions, as it adds a touch of elegance. A must-try if you're into the current vanilla trend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: At first spray, it smells like straight up vanilla extract. If you like that smell/the smell of vanilla and alcohol, you might like it. I don’t. And especially for THAT price, no thanks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I cannot recommend this perfume to anyone seeking an enjoyable fragrance experience. Its unpleasant scent, lack of complexity and short longevity, makes it a regrettable choice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Smelled this in store, it smells like vanilla scented play doh. There are way better vanilla fragrances out there for a much better price. Hard pass

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love vanilla fragrances and was so excited for this, but as others have said, it's like wearing vanilla extract...definitely a NO for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Extremely bad smell it actually stinks. I was not expecting this kinda fragrance from Tom ford. Save your $

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Tom Ford's latest fragrance, Vanilla Sex, is a captivating blend of warm vanilla, amber, floral notes, sweet undertones, and a touch of sandalwood. The combination is exquisite, creating a harmonious symphony of scents that beautifully intertwine. Upon application, the perfume transforms into a seamless blend, leaving a delightful and lingering fragrance on the body. The overall experience is a sensory journey that envelops you in a comforting and alluring aura. Tom Ford's Vanilla Sex perfume packaging exudes luxury with its meticulous design and attention to detail. The bottle, crafted with precision, showcases a sleek and sophisticated aesthetic. The choice of materials, whether it's glass or a high-quality polymer, enhances the overall luxurious feel. The packaging is not only a vessel for the fragrance but also a statement piece, reflecting the brand's commitment to elegance. From the fine finishing to the thoughtfully designed cap, every aspect contributes to the premium look and feel of the product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Just ew. Trashy name, smells disgusting. Nothing else to say.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Smelled this in store and to me smells very synthetic. It was a familiar scent but couldn’t place it until later, as it settled into my skin and finally realized it was the same scent as the vanilla garbage bags I get at dollarama.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This doesn’t smell good!!! Smells like Vicks and robitussin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dark skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this in store and it did not live up to the hype I see on tik tok and youtube. It does not smell great, at first when you spray it smells like vanilla extract that one uses for baking. When it dries down it smells horrible.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t understand the hype or the price for the TF . This one smells really bad. I’ll recommend cheaper options or going to the store and trying a sample before committing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: For the money, it’s not really worth it. Even at a lower price point, I don’t think it’s worth it. I was hoping for a warm vanilla scent and instead I got talcum powder and clay. It’s a hard pass for me. I had to return it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I sprayed this on me at a Sephora to test it out and it smells absolutely horrible! Save yourself the money and look up how to make vanilla extract. It smells the exact same and can be used as perfume

reviews.review_title: Vanilla ppl give it a try!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am definitely a vanilla girly. This perfume was very sexy, but for me it almost had a minty undertone to it. That’s the only part that I found a tiny flaw in. The vanilla is still rich though and it’s definitely a perfume I will continue to wear. I received many compliments on it and found that the smell lasts quite a while even though it does fade a bit. I def say give it a shot!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not for me. After 10 minutes it smelled like clay.

reviews.review_title: Smells okay on paper, but gross on skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Do not blind buy this!! I implore you to take a trip to the store to try it first. I love all things vanilla and I almost blindly bought it, but at $350 I figured let me try it just to be sure. On paper it smells like Ellis Vanilla Milk… you could smell a ton of vanilla, plus there was a sour milkiness to it, which I actually liked.  But when I sprayed it onto my skin?? Oh boy. It smelled like a urinal cake… that gross smell when you go into a public restroom and you get a mix of urine, bathroom cleaner, and that weird popurri that public bathrooms use. I made sure I wasn’t wearing any perfumes or lotions when I tried it so it wouldn’t mix with anything else, so I guess it just didn’t work with my skin chemistry. Try before you buy!!

reviews.review_title: Doesn’t last much more than an hour
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this complimentary for testing purposes. In the bottle it smells great/ reminds of horchata, overall has a lovely warm scent. After being sprayed, it takes around 30 mins to stop smelling just like chemicals and then it only lasts on your skin for another hour. It fade INCREDIBLY fast, I’ve even tried using a smaller amount and a large amount with no effect.  It does stick to clothes though, even when it’s dry if I put on a jacket my sleeve smells like it for at least a week. I really wanted to love this, I really tried and spent quite a bit of time with it to figure out how to best use it, but it just doesn’t last and is disappointing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was so so surprised when I opened my influensters box to find a full size fragrance bottle of VANILLA SEX by Tom Ford! Omg! The packaging was simple yet elegant…cream on black… perfect contrast, the scent I could almost describe the exact same way. TIMELESS, Present, ELEGANT, but not too over powering. I got so many compliments I ended up buying both my mom and aunt a bottle too!

reviews.review_title: It is a no for me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I find it pulls more of a almond scent on me that quickly settles down to what I can only describe as a floral/powdery bathroom soap. I do not think it is worth the money at all as there are better vanilla options out there like vanilla woods and Burberry goddess

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free for my honest review from Influenster. Can’t go wrong with vanilla… for me when I hear of a perfume or spray that has vanilla in it you know it’s going to be sweet. Yet, with this one I really enjoyed the sensual coziness the scent invoked. The almond scent to it seemed to give that sensuality. Since I received this product I have been wearing it everyday as I feel this is more of a fall/winter scent for me. When I’ve used it the scent has lasted all day and when I would move I’m able to get a wife of it. It really is a lovely fragrance and one I would continue to wear. I recommend this product and would encourage those who love the vanilla scent to add this to their collection and use.

reviews.review_title: Long lasting almond and vanilla fragrance
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received these products for free from Influenster and brand(s) in exchange for my honest review. What you get here is a long lasting and luxurious almond note first which then dries down into vanilla. While leaning more feminine, I do think a man can successfully pull it off. In fact, it may even score you more points with the ladies since this will be a scent that they are drawn to. Overall, it's really good and should be at the very least, sampled.

reviews.review_title: Smells like a dirty bathroom mixed with vanilla
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: You do not need this. This smells like the soap Planet Fitness has in their locker rooms lol. I can understand what they were going for since it is very heavy on the musky skin-like notes, and and it could be a very niche and particular scent for someone, but it smells more musty than anything. It really just reminds me of body odor or a dirty animal as harsh as that sounds. I was expecting it to be more indulgent and vanilla, but the immediate and lasting notes are much more spicy and musty. At least the stay power is great lol I couldn’t get it off for hours no matter how much I washed

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing scent very exquisite. It smells flowery like an orchid smells fancy, luxurious, and sexy. It is soft but with a strong scent that last all day long. It is worth every cent. Tom Ford you out did yourself with this one! The bottle is gorgeous it is such a pretty nude bottle looks expensive.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Let me preface this by saying that I am not a vanilla-forward perfume person. That being said, I feel like this is the best way to present it. It’s VERY vanilla forward, but somehow, with the combination of the other scents: florals, bitter almond, sandalwood and tonka, that’s ok. I really like it. It just works. I like to spray it on my body while I’m getting ready and then top it up with whichever scent I want to wear that day/night.  * This product was given to me complimentary by Influenster in exchange for my honest opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As a vanilla lover, I like this scent! The warm vanilla is inviting without being overly sugary or cloying. What sets it apart from other vanilla-based scents is the inclusion of a bitter almond note, which adds nuanced depth to the familiar sweetness of vanilla. It smelled pretty linear in that respect from start to finish, but I loved it, so I don't mind that about it. The projection is enough for it to be noticeable yet inoffensive. This quality makes it an excellent choice for a variety of settings, from professional environments to intimate gatherings. The most impressive aspect of this fragrance is its longevity. Remarkably, it lasted on me like 10 hours as a skin scent. Overall, this fragrance is a perfect choice for those who favor sensual, understated elegance!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Smells like a type of medicine! Just a slight vanilla! Really not a fan! I think bath and body works would do a better job! Very disappointed in the scent! Not worth it specially for the price!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love vanilla scents, so I was super excited to receive this Tom Ford vanilla sex fragrance. First off, the packaging is absolutely beautiful with the color scheme they chose. Everything about the packaging feels luxe so it would also make for a great gift. Right off the bat, you will get a whiff of vanilla, but as you let it sit on you, you will be able to tell that the smell deepens into the sandalwood notes in the fragrance. This fragrance is definitely more mature and sophisticated smelling than a typical sweet, vanilla perfume. I would definitely recommend to have as part of your collection if you are a fan of vanilla and sandalwood scents.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: First, thank you so much Influenster for sending me Vanilla Sex by Tom Ford! It’s a great product, by a great brand! The opening is very much vanilla. It is very smooth and sweet. There are florals in there but they just add to the scent.. as the florals are never a dominant note behind the vanilla and nuttiness. It has pretty good staying power and projection. Which I was surprised by because it’s not a very heavy gourmand. It’s definitely a gourmand type of scent but a little more airy and light.   I think it would smell better on ladies. It has a very “pretty” smell. Very elegant. Sweet, but not cloying.  I was very impressed and excited to receive this one!! 5 out of 5 ⭐️

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite Tom Ford fragrance now!  I love it. But I'm only giving it 4 stars because it doesn't last very long. (So I'll probably have to buy another bottle before long as I wear it every day.)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was FLOORED at how good this smells. It feels like a more sophisticated Vanilla that has grown up with me. I love this scent, and it lasts all day, and then some. I highly recommend, and I feel like the product would be well worth the money

Absolutely LOVE the scent. It smells almost like root beer to me. The MAJOR problem I have with It is, within 30 minutes of spraying It- you can no longer smell It. For $250, I 100% expect to smell good the entire day & night!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Let me start by saying I am very picky when it comes to frangrance. I'm usually not a fan of Tom Ford fragrances. That being said, Vanilla Sex is intoxicating! It's as if this fragrance were created just for me! Right away I smell vanilla and almond, two of my all time favorite scents. It is sweet but not overly sweet. It is not overpowering or to perfumy. I would describe it as a creamy gourmand musky fragrance. Very sensual. As with all Tom Ford items, it is beautifully packaged. It does last through the work day on my skin. Would be perfect for romantic datenight. I would definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m always on the hunt for a delicious vanilla fragrance. At first smell, through the underlying notes of almond and amber, I find the vanilla scent to be almost too cloying. Given an hour or two, the smell becomes a bit more welcoming almost like a warm blanket on a cold day.  I can see why some people wouldn’t go for this scent off the bat, but given a bit of time the scent develops wonderfully.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I wore this for Christmas and everyone was in love. You smell like a really rich vanilla cake! Definitely long lasting, a little bit goes a long way. 10/10 recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a nice soft scent for daily wear. It does have a strong vanilla scent but the name kinda implies that anyway.  I like it and it wears nicely.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Thank you Influenster and Tom Ford for this complimentary product. Omg, this fragrance is a life changer! My hubby cannot keep his hands off me when I'm wearing this #VanillaSex perfume lol. If I get pregnant, I'm naming the baby Tom Ford as a first name. Lol. Notes aren't too musky or a disturbance to the senses. The vanilla leaves you feeling sexy but not overpowering. Long lasting. Great winter buy for sure. Xoxo

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nice package but this perfume is not my style. This fragrance is too sweet and smells like generic vanilla. Not worth to pay for this expensive product, I would not recommend this if you don’t like strong sweet or generic scent. I received this product for free in exchange of my honest review

reviews.review_title: Must Have Winter and Fall Fragrance!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Received this product in exchange for an honest review. Tom Ford's Vanilla fragrance is a versatile scent that thrives best in cooler weather, delivering a warm and inviting aroma. Its adaptability allows it to transition seamlessly from daytime wear to an evening allure. The silage, or scent trail, is notably robust, leaving a captivating aura that lingers subtly yet impressively throughout the day or evening. Its impressive longevity ensures that the comforting essence of vanilla remains present for hours, making it a reliable choice for those seeking a long-lasting and sophisticated fragrance experience.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product for a couple weeks, I fell in love with it, at first the fragrance is kinda strong but after a couple minutes it becomes really sweet

reviews.review_title: A must have in your fragrance collection
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This smells so good. If you are a big fan of smelling sweet and like vanilla than this fragrance is absolutely for you. The smells is a little strong at first but the wear time and down is good. Definitely a good have in your collection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Upon initial spray, it reminded me of a Mac lipstick scent but quickly a bitter almond. This isn’t that warm vanilla you think it is! 10 mins later it smelled like a bathroom freshener..had to scrub this off asap! Hard pass

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing for layering , I either layer with Vanilla skin by phlur or layer with Lost Cherry and it’s so amazing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: https://vm.tiktok.com/ZM6mqMk4Q/ Top note of ALMOND Heart note SPOILED MILK  Base note RUBBER/PLASTIC     Base note

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Something in the immediate and early dry down smells dirty, licorice or playdoh like. Longevity is poor. Not sweet at all. Overall disappointing.

reviews.review_title: Strong at first, but let it settle
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was really excited to receive this fragrance. I already have two other Tom Ford fragrances. At first spray, it is a strong vanilla smell. Let it settle for a few minutes. I think it is best to let it mix with your own body scent. It smooths down to a subtle vanilla with a milkyness to it. I can see layering this with something like Tom Ford Bitter Peach.

reviews.review_title: Worst Smell in a Perfume Ever
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve learned never to blind buy Tom Ford fragrances so thank goodness I stopped by my local Sephora to smell it. Brought me back to Anatomy class when we dissected pigs filled with formaldehyde (embalming fluid). No joke. Please don’t blind buy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Until this perfume my opinion was often that all vanilla scented perfumes smelled mostly the same. I was wrong. This scent manages to be both clean and fresh but with the vanilla base we love and require in a vanilla perfume. Love this stuff and a little goes a long way! Long lasting too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this perfume as a free sample! It's a heavenly Vanilla infused scent that's just right not to overwhelming or overpowering, it's my new go to for any occasion, I've received loads of compliments on it an the combo of vanilla, spicy an saddlewood are chefs kiss! The saddlewood doesn't take over the vanilla scents.

reviews.review_title: NOT vanilla- smells like cherry cola
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This does not smell like vanilla at all! If you’re a vanilla lover, I’d go for the Tobacco Vanille. This smells like cherry cola, and it dries down to a creamy scent with small notes of vanilla. While it’s not bad, it’s just not vanilla

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked this as a nice, winter time perfume. It’s a true vanilla scent with a warm feeling to it. But it does not last long. It goes away after about 3 hours. I’ll probably put it in a travel bottle to use it more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Sweet, clean, vanilla, creamy milk. This fragrance is perfection for the clean girl that likes vanilla. I think the special thing about this fragrance is that it isn't overpowering. It gives off that less is more vibe. Very rich vibes. I can see this being worn year round.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: if you like vanilla this is the perfect scent for you!!! this parfum has a very strong vanilla spell, it can be a little overpowering so be careful when you apply it. A little can go a long way!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Tf fragrances are such a let down! This smelled like spoiled milk with a strange burned plasticy smell. Its so hard to describe but deff a no for me. I disliked it instantly and to make it worse it doesnt last.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received the Tom Ford Vanilla Sex Fragrance for free in exchange for my honest review and while it smells good and lasts for a long time the smell is a bit too vanilla for my taste and I didn’t love the way it smelled on me. If you like fragrances with vanilla you will love it! The bottle and packaging are beautiful and it will make a great gift for a loved one

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love, love, love it! I’m someone who’s very sensitive to perfumes but honestly it’s strong for the first 10mins but eventually it turns into a sweet warm scent. Received so many compliments!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free in exchange for an honest review. It has a warm and robust vanilla scent. If you like vanilla, you'll like this scent. It dries down to a powdery finish, and the longer you wear it, the better the smell gets throughout the day. If you dislike vanilla, you'll hate this scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love the smell of this perfume. I will say the scent is very vanilla-y so you would have to like a vanilla scent. I’m not crazy about the name since I have littles that are learning to read and get in my stuff all the time. Aside from that, this is my new favorite!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Not worth the money I returned it. Smells exactly like “Vanilla” body lotion by Tree Hut. Which I barely liked but dealt with bc I already used some of it. Also kinda smells like vanilla bean ice cream that’s been melted on a thrift store couch

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ok. I LOVE Tom Ford but this smells like straight up whisky when you first spray it. I’m surprised I haven’t seen comments that it smells like alcohol. But THEN after a couple minutes it smells like vanilla extract. Its ok.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This smells like vanilla with a hint of cinnamon.  Beautiful packaging and a beautiful scent.  My daughter has stolen it from me because she loves it too

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the light vanilla scent. It lasts all day long with just a light spray. The packaging is perfect. The bottle cap is easy to remove and the bottle is easy to hold while spraying.

reviews.review_title: Give it a chance, you might be surprised!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This was my first experience with a Tom Ford fragrance and while I found the product at first to be very overwhelming, the more I have worn it, the more I have grown to really like it. The smell softens and fades a bit over time to a lovely pleasant scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am such a Tom Ford fan that I ordered this without smelling it. I know that’s risky but it paid off! This is not the sickly sweet vanilla many fragrances emit. It is a warm, sensual, sandalwood blend which lasts longer than most vanilla scents too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from Influenster but this opinion is my own. This fragrance is warm and comforting and wears well throughout the day and the scent lingers. If you like warm slightly spicy gourmand scents you will love this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love gourmands & vanilla warm scents so I wanted to try this. This smells medicinal, like a pharmacy. I do not recommend. There are other options that don’t cost an arm & a leg. Definitely overrated!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a tom ford girl so naturally when this came out I had to smell it. It’s disappointing! It smells like the dollar vanilla spray I used to wear when I was in junior high school. Not worth the price or the hype

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: When I first sprayed this, the sandalwood really stood out, and it smelled almost like an artificial vanilla. As someone who almost exclusively wears niche and indie gourmands, I like realistic foodie scents more. But after wearing it for a few minutes, I became a big fan! This is such a nice, rich vanilla. It’s very versatile and sophisticated while still being sweet. That artificial note didn’t last at all. Also it lasts very well- I get a solid day of wear from spraying this on. Definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was really excited to try this, but quickly disappointed. I cannot stand this overly sweet, gourmand perfume. The scent turns my stomach. It is disgustingly sweet, I will not wear this perfume. I haven't found a Tom Ford fragrance that I like yet. Also the scent doesn't last long dissapates very quickly after.

Nope. I don’t generally like Tom Ford scents, but I love vanilla, and was hoping this would be different. It just stinks. Smells like something old and rancid at the dry down. Also, giving a hint of playdoh. A no for me and it was returned.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I sprayed this on my body in the store and it literally smells like the beach restroom stalls if that makes any sense  Lost cherry is the best Tom ford scent though

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this perfume in exchange for my honest review. Besides it being on the pricer side there are no complaints here! I love the subtle hints of sandalwood & it is not too overwhelming. It can be for every day use if you love vanilla. Plus it’s not too sweet, its a perfect balance!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product definitely smells like vanilla. That is the only scent I get from this. It's like a vanilla cake. It smells good but it wouldnt chose it for a perfume. It's more like a scent for the house. If you like Smelling like a cake then this is for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: If you like a sweet vanilla scent, this is perfect for you. It is not spicy to me at all, and you can def find cheaper alternatives in my opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is another great fragrance from Tom Ford.   If you like Tom Ford scents,  you are going to LOVE his newest one.   Not too heavy but not too light.   Lasts all day and makes the heads turn and compliments abound from both men and  women!   This will be one of my new favorites.   I do not think it smells like the bathroom fresheners nor horrible like other reviewers but each to his own.   However, I do not see a man wearing this fragrance.    I did receive this for free from Influenster for an honest review.

reviews.review_title: Warm and cozy for the winter!
reviews.review_text: Tom Ford's Vanilla sex is a sweet and intriguing fragrance, warm vanilla with spicy/woodsy notes. Its aroma captivates, but some might find it a bit intense or too similar to other TF gourmands. I gave it 4/5 stars for its unique character and long-lasting appeal. I received this product to write a review

reviews.review_title: A decent vanilla with performace issues
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this free product from Tom Ford and Influenster in exchange for my honest review.  I was very excited to try this product as Tom Ford is in my top three fragrance houses and it being winter when I normally start wearing my gourmands more.  The presentation is in the classic Tom Ford bottle and is always classy and presentable.  The scent goes on with a big blast of vanilla bean which isn't overpowering or cloying.  It might be the almonds which tones down the sweetness a bit and makes me think of almost a slightly dirty vanilla.   As the wearing goes on the dirtiness dies down and the vanilla goes into more of a stereotypical sweet vanilla.  It's pleasant but definitely not groundbreaking.  I feel you initially have a good sillage bubble around you but that dies off quickly.  It's a unisex fragrance although I feel it leans feminine but can easily be pulled off by a confident man.  Longevity is my biggest concern here as I get about 4-5 hours before this becomes a skin scent.  At $250 for a 1 ounce bottle MSRP, I'm going to need a lot more performance than that.  A rare lukewarm offering from Tom Ford in my humble opinion.

reviews.review_title: Creamy, Soft, Powdery Vanilla, light floral, Musk
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a huge vanilla fan so I purchased this blindly. Vanilla Sex reminds me a lot of the Silky Underwear powder at LUSH, with a pinch more vanilla. It’s not very sweet, you will not smell like cookies. It is a creamy, soft, powdery, light floral. It changes a lot in the first hour, but lingers softly afterwards. This is a nice fall/winter fragrance. Also spring appropriate because of the powder and floral. Reminds me of soaking in the tub with a butterball bath bomb while burning Palo Santo. This is softer, yet more complex than kayali vanilla (which I love as well) but has that grown up vanilla scent. Smells more expensive and complex than warm vanilla sugar, but would also put this in the same type class. For the price point I probably will not re-purchase.  If you love soft, powdery, vanilla woodsy scents, this would be one that I would recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My sister was delighted, I gave it to her and she immediately started using it, I was a little sad to give it away, but she is fascinated by perfumes, so I knew that she would appreciate it a lot, and so she did, she told me that the vanilla scent It was so soft and powerful at the same time, that I didn't know how to express it, the truth is that it is a very good quality perfume, even just by passing by me or a little far from me I could notice the rich aroma that it left in its wake. I would definitely buy it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First off, I really dislike the Influenster Reviews. They take away from the credibility of Sephora’s review system.  I actually purchased the larger sized bottle when there was a 20% off discount. I own most of the Tom Ford fragrances from his private line. Unfortunately this one has zero staying power and will be returned.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this complimentary in exchange for my review. I was extremely excited! I was unfortunately rather disappointed. It smells wonderfully, but it has absolutely no staying power. AT ALL! I never smell it again after the initial sprays. I think it would have been great if not for that.

reviews.review_title: Search the “fields” for a better value 😏
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love Tom Ford and appreciate this new addition to my collection in exchange for my honest review but this one doesn’t last very long. For the price I need it to stick around. Read the headline for my choice. 😳

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am absolutely in love with this perfume. It is everything I want in a delicious gourmand scent that is still refined. It smells like a vanilla bean with almond. It wears all day long. I love the way the bottle looks. 10/10. My absolute favorite new scent. The only problem is the cost! I anticipate using up this entire bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: vanilla and sex. What’s not to love? Trust me this ain’t it. I’m a vanilla girl. I love scents like Burberry goddess, kayali vanilla and black opium. This is a huge disappointment. Smells like sweat and bad decisions.

reviews.review_title: Tom Ford defines Vanilla essence in 2023's closing
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Vanilla Tincture India and two other vanilla notes in this perfume build a complex vanilla compound of dark, light, soft essences. It then layers soft undertones of almond, sandalwood, and floral notes to complete the sensual aroma that is vanilla sex. One of the things I like the most about vanilla sex is the longevity of the scent. When you put it on before leaving the house you won't have to reapply till the next time you're wearing it. The names Tom Ford comes up with for their scents are somewhat jovial and could be considered cheesy, but when you get past that, what's in the bottle always makes up for it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: At first smell, this is a unique vanilla with a strong almond note, which I love. But then the musk comes through, and it is almost giving… bathroom air freshener? I go back and forth with this. My coworker thought I smelled like vanilla coffee creamer. It does last a while, and it is really good, but I don’t know if I’ll ever move past the lingering bathroom smell?

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was the strongest vanilla scented smell I’ve ever had. It’s a pure smell so it doesn’t have that sticky sweet smell some of them have. There is also a slightly musky undertone that feels earthy and grounded. I love the way it lingered around my room for hours. Sadly though, it does not like my body chemicals and I had a weird after scent on my skin, but we tried it for my daughter and it smelled amazing on her. She had happily claimed this scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got this product in an exchange for a review so here are my thoughts:  I personally loved it very much and I like the fact it’s unisex because I feel like it fits everyone, it’s sweet but warm at the same time and I feel like this is perfect for fall and winter but also for any late night occasions as it’s very sensual and seductive, in a way it kind of reminds me of the cherry fragrance Tom Ford has but it still is very vanilla and just great, I really loved it so much

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received a full size sample of Tom Ford Vanilla Sex from Influenster and was very pleased with this perfume. It was so long lasting that I put it on in the morning and could still enjoy the scent late at night. The scent is subtle yet very pleasant. I found it soothing yet exciting at the same time. I absolutely love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this out instore, it's HORRIBLE  so glad I didn't blind buy, this I thought would have been fragrance of the year, it's won't. smells like toilet water, repulsive. Burberry Goddess is the best vanilla perfume to date, Lush Vanillary is good to, even bath and body works is better than this, that's how sad it is

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely loved this perfume! It is long lasting and I've received so many compliments about it! Can be for a man or woman with its woodiness and sensual vanilla. I've worn it as casual and to a dinner party. Would recommend this to others!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume has a nice sweet smell, it’s for people who like to smell like a cookie. People who are into floral or musky scents won’t like this. I personally liked this perfume but it is super strong so it’s hard to layer with other perfumes

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is perfect if you love the scent vanilla. It’s super long lasting and my husband LOVES this scent on me and doesn’t mind if I spritz him with it as well. Definitely recommended! I’m so happy I got this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Put this fragrance on before work and it lasted all day long as if I just put it on. Has a great smell to it and my boyfriend also loved it too. Would recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Porcelain skin tone, Oily skin
