reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary in exchange for my honest review. One of the good things about the perfume was the staying power. Only a small amount is needed and it will last all day. However, i am not a huge fan of vanilla scents, so I did not care much for smell. There was a musky smell mixed in with the vanilla (probably the sex part) that was off-putting to me. If someone is a big fan of vanilla scented perfumes, i think they would really like this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is by far the worst persume I've ever smelled, if it can be called that. It smelled of chemicals and a little almond extract. It made me feel sick to smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely gorgeous smell. Perfect to wear it on special occasions. Smells just rich and  elegant.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After trying out this fragrance for myself and for my SO we both like it. Tom Ford has long lasting fragrance with only one to two sprays. The warm vanilla is a nice addition to your winter wardrobe.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Received the Tom Ford Beauty Vanilla Sex for reviewing purposes and starting off with the packaging of the fragrance is absolutely lovely as the name suggests this fragrance is all about vanilla scent. What makes it unique is that it does start off with an intense scent but as time passes it becomes more subtle and pleasant. The scent lasts for hours .. it has become my favorite scent during this winter time, I get compliments from people on how the scents of the Tom Ford Beauty Vanilla Sex is so excellent..

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love the packaging of this perfume and how beautifully heavy the bottle is. It looks great on display! The scent mostly smells to me like vanilla extract (re:almond) which in general is not my favorite as I typically don’t prefer sweeter scents. Though I wouldn’t reach for this off first smell, I believe this vanilla perfume to be one of the most complex and sophisticated vanilla scents I’ve ever tried. If you like sweet perfume but want something a little more elegant and mature, this is a great option.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The scent is lovely. Vanilla, but spicy vanilla, not confectionary. It’s interesting, and thankfully, not musky. It is not overpowering or cloying. I received this for free for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am so happy that I was able to try out this perfume, it has a wonderful vanilla scent however I'm not a fan of the sandalwood. I feel like it's a little overpowering. Besides the sandalwood it's a great perfume that lasts a long time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a fan of vanilla scents but this one is unlike anything I’ve used in the past. It is warm and not overly sweet. It is not overpowering, yet I can smell the vanilla, floral, and almond notes. I don’t put much on at a time and it lasts all day. The packaging is very nice as well. The bottle feels luxurious, looks beautiful, and it sprays nicely.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This was a free product that was sent to me to give honest opinion.  The scent could last for more than a day and it has a very sophisticated smell.  But I am not into sweet scents as I like citrus and floral ones better. Don’t get me wrong as the perfume smells really good, it’s just that I am not into sweet ones.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was lucky enough to be sent this EDP to sample, and it did not disappoint. The best way to describe it is a scent similar to vanilla extract, with a warm undertone that compliments it over time and last for a while. Will definitely be a go to fragrance going forward for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This a gent is super vanilla-y, but just like the name it’s like a sexy smell. Not sweet at all, lasts on the skin for a long time and honestly, I feel like it gets better and better as you wear it more. Love it so much!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The bottle and packaging of this is super nice and will be a very nice addition to my perfume shelf. As for the scent, I do like it and have received compliments on it when wearing. It sure does smells like pure vanilla scent extract at times, but I will definitely use it from time to time….definitely pair it with other fragrances that I have.  I received this perfume from Influenster to give my honest opinion and review on it.   I tested it over a few weeks, increasing the amount I would wear. It does not give a head/ migraines. This one, however, isn't, and hasn't triggered one thus far. I can wear it all day, busy mother of 3! I’m surprised at the end of the day I could still smell.the perfume on me. It has hints of almond, and spice, so for someone who baking (like myself), it is an excellent scent. I definitely would recommend if you like vanilla scents and it’s unisex.

reviews.review_title: It varies on person to person
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recieved this product from Influencer for my honest review. The initial application was strong and a bit overwhelming but as the day went on the scent was subtle and low lasting. My daughters experience was exceptional and the scent worked better with her youthful presence and pasted well into the evening and was exceptionally pleasant on her.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Tom Ford's Vanilla Sex Eau de Parfum is an exquisite olfactory experience that captivates the senses. The intoxicating blend of vanilla notes is both alluring and sophisticated, leaving a lasting impression. The fragrance strikes the perfect balance between sweetness and sensuality, making it a timeless addition to any collection. The longevity is impressive, and the luxurious packaging adds an extra touch of elegance.   This fragrance is a true masterpiece, embodying Tom Ford's signature style and commitment to excellence. Highly recommended for those who appreciate distinctive, high-quality scents.

reviews.review_title: Smells like Oatmilk and Comforting Vanilla Softsoa
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Olive skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very nice scent. Very sexy and warm. I'm not much of a Vanilla girlie, but I liked this one. It smells just like Oatmilk and Comforting Vanilla from Softsoap, so if you like that, you will love this! Personally, I didn't care for it for myself, but it is a very nice scent overall.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Tom Ford and Influenster in exchange for my honest review. When I saw it was coming, I did a quick search and was disheartened to learn there was an amber note. I love vanilla and I ADORE sandalwood and tonka - but amber usually gives me migraines. Happy to say that whatever high quality oil is used in Vanilla Sex does NOT trigger me!  And I love the fragrance! Initially I smell mainly sweet vanilla and almond (my man says I smell like cookies), which is nice - but the dry down is my favorite. Subtle whispers of sandalwood, tonka, and amber give this a VERY sexy quality, and it lasts for hours on me. I can also still get a whiff of vanilla, which is nice because then I smell like sexy and sophisticated cookies.  Took off one star just because I think the addition of a fruity (maybe citrus or berry) note is what would make this a holy grail for me! For now, it shall just be my date night go to.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: So I was obsessed with this perfume when I first got it. I had gotten a lot of compliments on it and was absolutely loving it! But the last 2 times I’ve worn it it smells like the baby diaper rash cream “butt paste” and I can’t get over smelling that on myself!? I have absolutely no idea why it would smell like that to me all of a sudden but it does. I am still planning to wear it and hopefully it won’t smell this way to me anymore. I really have gotten many compliments on it and it does smell really smooth. There’s just that weird note of butt paste when it dries down.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Tom Ford did not disappoint with this scent! Really nice vanilla perfume.  I love vanilla but often find the scent to be too sweet. This one does not have you smelling like a cupcake.   *I received this complementary from Influenster and Tom Ford.

reviews.review_title: For those who love light vanilla scents
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Tom Ford vanilla sex is a nice scent of vanilla and sandalwood.  The perfume isn't heavy, it's a lighter scent.  I wanted to love this but I felt something was missing.  I wanted a more complex scent, like a musk to compliment the vanilla.  There is this alcohol smell that comes through that is a little unappealing to me.  Overall it's an ok fragrance.  Complimentary of Influenster

reviews.review_title: I can’t get enough of this scent!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Tom Ford Beauty Vanilla Sex Eau De Perfume is a sweet and sensual fragrance that is considered unisex. However, it smells completely different on me when compared to my spouse. We both agreed that it smells best on her. The powerful vanilla notes are long-lasting, and only one spray is needed to last all day. The spray has a milky appearance and unique feel on the skin. I recommend applying it to bare skin instead of clothing for the best results. Overall, I highly recommend this scent.

reviews.review_title: I really really didn’t want to love this but…
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: GIRRLLLLLLLL do I sure love it!!! It’s legit the most perfect vanilla scent you can imagine. Not too sweet, not too musky. It’s sultry and satisfying, and I’ve gotten so many compliments when I’ve worn it.

reviews.review_title: Must have this perfume it’s a conversation starter
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: When I first tried the product in the store I thought it smelled like someone poured a bottle of vanilla extract on me. As the perfume ages and settles down it smells really nice and it’s perfect for layering with other fragrances. fragrancesgotten so many compliments every time I wear it

reviews.review_title: Love love love TF Vanilla Sex Fragrance!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Hove the smell of vanilla and when I found out Tim Ford released Vanilla Sex I just had to try the fragrance. I'm all about choosing scents that are unique and definitely not musky (like most men's colognes). Vanilla Sex has a subtle sandalwood opening and then a burst of fresh vanilla to warm and entice those around you. As the day goes on the fragrance turns to more of an almond scent with a hint of vanilla, while on my skin. Each day after I spray on the fragrance it immediately boosts my mood and makes me feel so pleasant. I definitely recommend Tom Ford Vanilla Sex - it's my favorite scent and will quickly become yours too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked the scent, but my husband did not.  It was very vanilla and not super sweet, but did not last long.  Because of the lasting factor I am not sure that it would be worth it at the price point.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great perfume, but I'm just not the biggest fan of the scent. It lasts basically all day, it just not my favorite scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received a free sample of this in exchange for an honest review. Let me start by saying I am a Tom Ford lady. I live in Fn Fabulous, Black orchid, and have worn Velvet orchid and others in the past, and my husband has Oud Wood and another. I'm into his bold scent profiles. This one is ok. Just maybe not me. It's vanilla. It is that 90s era throwback vanilla that transports me to a bath and body shop when i worked retail in.college vanilla. I wouldn't wear it on its own, but when i layered it with other TF scents, it worked. Not for me, but for you if you are a vanilla scented candle type person. It is growing on me as a layered scent for winter, but I wouldn't re purchase.

reviews.review_title: Scent is AMAZING & LONG LASTING! The name suits it
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging of the fragrance is very and elegant. The bottle itself has a nice weight to it, you can definitely feel the quality. The scent of vanilla is at first strong but in seconds it settles and softens up and it is absolutely lovely. I’ve worn this to two events so far, and even after dancing for hours,  you can still smell it. I’ve gotten several compliments on the fragrance itself. Definitely a greeeeat perfume as just two pumps will last you throughout the entire day. Highly recommend whether it’s a gift for yourself or for your significant other!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: When I first sprayed it I got vanilla and then immediately an almond scent. I was thrown off at first because it was such an acidic scent. I would say it’s more of a mature scent, I think I liked it the most when it settled on my skin which was about an hour after I wore it because I could smell the vanilla more. It’s not the bottle I reach for when I spray my perfume before leaving the house but it is a beautiful scent just not what I prefer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Yalll iff your a vanilla person get this... its grown and sexy very light not over powering I only had to reapply 2x through out my 7/8 hour shift

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This scent is very long lasting, and you only need one small spray to get the full effect. The tonka bean and sandalwood notes are very strong initially, but as the scent mellows, it's the vanilla that plays the long game. It's not overly sweet smelling like a lot of gourmand scents, but rather has a nice warm depth to it. Since you only need a small amount to get the effect, the bottle will surely last a long while, making the price point a bit more reasonable. As someone who does not generally gravitate towards fragrances in the gourmand family, I was pleasantly surprised with how much I liked wearing this scent.  I received this product from Tom Ford and Influenster in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this and I’m shocked. Vanilla is sometimes tricky and too sweet or strong. It often gives me a headache but this is really nice and subtle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this perfume! If you are into any kind of vanilla notes in your perfume then this is for you! I use one spray and it lasts for hours. It is a very strong scent. I feel very luxurious wearing it!! I received this product free from influester in exchange for my honest opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I did really enjoy this sent! Tom Ford scents are always worth the cost! They are more expensive then so many other options however it truly is 1 spray and done! That 1 spray will last you ALL day! Where as so many others several sprays doesn't even last half of the day. So Value is 100% there! As far as the scent any Tom Ford scents I've tried are intended to be unisex but tend to lean a little more one way or the other. This one I felt smelled more feminine which made me like it more. I found it to be a scent that I'd wear more formally then casually because it is stronger and I personally like a more calm airy scent for day to day. So this bottle will certainly last me a very longtime! The initial smell is an overwhelming Vanilla but that intensity calms skin after & leaves a very pleasant smell of vanilla that is not overwhelming. Anyone on the fence I'd say definitely buy it don't let the cost hold you back you will get every bit you pay back out of it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: First, this bottle is absolutely gorgeous. This is a very pretty almondy, milky vanilla. This does not smell foul like the Ellis Brooklyn Vanilla Milk, the TF is much better executed. However, the projection on this is weak, and turns into a skin scent pretty quickly. I just think for the price I cant say that it is worth it. You can get a really great milky vanilla called Bianco Latte for a much better price per ounce. If you already have vanilla perfumes I wouldn't recommend this one. The packaging makes me want to keep it but may end up returning.
I love vanilla perfumes and I was so excited to try this one. I tested it in the store and immediately hated it. Smells like a mix of BO and play dough. Definitely not worth the price point.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: At dry down, TF VS smells almost identical to Ellis Brooklyn Vanilla Milk. TF does not have the strong, sour, leather, repulsive opening that VM has, but after a few minutes they are very comparable. Minodifferences.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: If you were ever going to splurge and treat yourself to an expensive perfume, this is it! I did not expect to be wowed this much with a perfume. First and foremost, the packaging is an experience all on its own. It has a gorgeous presentation. The bottle itself is stunning and I will absolutely be displaying it. The depth of the scent is next level. I definitely pick up on the vanilla, sandalwood, and almond notes. The vanilla hits first and strongest. I think the scent is very long lasting and I feel like I only needed 2 spritz to be content with the intensity. I realize that this is marketed as a genderless/unisex scent, but I believe that this would come off a too vanilla/almond-like for most men. It’s not the sweetest perfume I’ve ever used, but it definitely leans more feminine.   Side note: this perfume layers amazing with the Billie Eilish perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product from Influenster and Tom Ford for free in exchange for my honest review.  I am always a big fan of vanilla perfumes. I’ve tried many brands and I believe this is my favorite vanilla perfume so far.   It comes with a sweet vanilla scent first. It’s floral, fruity and warm. After a few hours, the scent becomes more sophisticated. The sandalwood neutralize the floral part and makes the over all scent woody and mysterious.   I really like the design of the bottle: elegant and simple. However, the cap of the bottle sometimes comes off easily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Idk if it was the sample I tried but it smelt musty, like body odor, it was giving stank

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am not a big fragrance wearer but wow! This one is one I will definitely be getting again! It is the perfect amount of sweetness and it lasts all day! 10/10 recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance has a very unique scent , it’s a scent I have never smelled before. You get a little of the vanilla but the nutty almond scent comes stronger. I really wish the vanilla was stronger. At first I wasn’t to sure about it, but the more I used it the more I like it, definitely not an everyday scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: so disappointed. When you first spray it, it smells like spicy rum and bad breath. The vanilla scent starts appearing after hours. Not worth it one bit.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it! This is a light scent. It doesn’t overpower the room, but leaves you smelling wonderful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Did I have a flashback to my teen years when vanilla body splash was all the rage? Yes, absolutely.   This perfume is everything you would expect. It is very vanilla forward. One spray is more than enough and the fragrance lasts all day.  Upon first application, you get a fast flood of sweet vanilla. After a while, it mellows out and becomes a bit more musky and sophisticated.  At first I did not care for the perfume, but it changed and grew on me as I wore it throughout the day. You might enjoy it, too, even if you don’t love vanilla based fragrances.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is beautiful if you like musk and warm fragrances , definitely can smell the hints of almond, somewhat smells like vanilla extract. it does smell like something I’ve smelled before. It has a nice staying power, would probably have to spray on again at some point in the day, the bottle is beautifully designed. I would not purchase on my own though if I smelled it in the store. Maybe too sweet smell for my taste.  “I received these products for free from Influenster  and Tom Ford in exchange for my honest review.”

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Such a yummy perfume, if you want something sexy but soft for the day time I highly recommend this perfume. It is a super sweet perfume at the same time. Good to wear you will get compliments!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Using this product a few days, and it's a musky, sexier vanilla fragrance.  It's sensual and lasts a good amount of time for a fragrance. I received this product free for my honest feedback.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was really excited to be blown away but this smells like warm vanilla sugar from BBW but watered down. For the price, I was expecting the finest vanilla and sandalwood you could find. Save your coins queen.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Smells nice like vanilla and almond but doesn’t last very long and is pretty subtle. Not worth the price especially for such a small bottle.

I really liked this perfume as it smells like vanilla but I don’t hints of other smells.  I like It for a daily perfume but I wouldn’t use on a night out as it doesn’t smell sensual. Overall when I wear it I feel like I smell like a vanilla cupcake.  Cute and fragranced.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Not worth the money! Too light of a fragrance ! Will have to use the whole bottle if you want to smell anything. Will be returning

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is good for anyone that loves the vanilla and musky smell. I have never really been a vanilla type ot girl but I honestly love this one because its not an over powering smell, once you spray it one it's just the perfect scent of vanilla and I personally feel like once you spray it onto the skin it's a more subtle.

reviews.review_title: not worth it, don’t read the incentivized reviews
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: normally I don’t write reviews but it was shocking to see how many “received free product for review” tags that took up almost all of the reviews when I was thinking about buying this. all of the real reviews were all bad, and i agree with them. the scent doesn’t last, the perfume itself smells like vanilla mixed with rubbing alcohol, overall not worth the price tag at all. gave it a fair shot but ultimately ended up returning. there are so many more affordable vanilla perfumes that are much better, I’d stay away from this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got a sample in store. I love TF but this one was a miss. Reminded me slightly of Ellis Brooklyn Vanilla Milk because it’s rich and creamy, but also has an almost spoiled milk smell that near immediately started developing into a play dough scent. To be clear I actually am not a fan of vanilla milk either. My boyfriend thought this smelled gross as soon as he sniffed me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: When I originally smelt this scent it had a medicine smell like Nyquil. But I decided to wear it anyway one day and it didn't settle into my skin like a medicine smell. I could definitely smell the Vanilla. And it was very sweet smelling first but gradually settles throughout wear, but it last all day long. I've received a ton of compliments but still trying to see if this is a scent for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Was super excited to try this as soon as it was released. Got my nose on it at my local Sephora and could NOT believe how bad this smelled, especially for the price tag! It’s just bad.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I had really high hopes for this scent but it just isn’t for me. Not even too much is too strong, a little bit goes a long way. Maybe if I can find another scent to balance it with then I’ll be over the moon

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: For days I couldn’t pinpoint what this reminded me of and finally it came to me…it smells just like a root beer float. Sweet but has an interesting depth to it. I wouldn’t recommend as a blind buy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried so many fragrances and i have to say this was one that i fell in love with the moment i smelled it. It was very subtle vanilla fragrance but had notes of jasmine and Almond and it was so a perfect blend for me. It last for hours at a time and i could smell it even after a full day out. I got many compliments on this fragrance over the holidays as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gorgeous scent, but no staying power whatsoever. I wanted to keep this, but after 4-5 sprays the scent was gone within an hour or two. Sadly, had to return.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is an amazing vanilla fragrance very heavy on almonds. The first spray smells like marzipan and then it settles down to a very warm, lactonic almondy vanilla. This is a perfect winter scent and a total compliment getter. I can smell some white florals in there but very subtle. All in all, love it!  *received complimentary in exchange for my honest review from Influenster

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of my fave scents. I do think the price is a little steep but thankfully it is long lasting. I typically spritz myself once or twice and lasts all day. I've layered with Valentino UOMO and it's great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love it!!! Stunning scent, a very elegant vanilla scent. Not sweet or childlike. The bitter almond note cuts through for a really sexy and unique scent that stands out. Best way to describe this scent is sensual

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Sweet & Clean vanilla scent pair well with phlur vanilla skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as a free sample but the opinion on this fragrance is my own. Honestly, this smells like French vanilla almond ice cream. The vanilla isn’t sweet but smells exactly like a pure vanilla extract. That smell can either be awesome or terrible to people or on other people’s skin so I HIGHLY RECOMMEND YOU SAMPLE THIS FIRST! It doesn’t evolve or change much from that initial spray so what you get is what you get. The performance is alright. It gives off a very strong projection in the beginning hour but dies down quickly to a nice skin scent for the remaining 4-6 hours. The problem isn’t that this scent smells bad to me (I love it) but it’s the cost of the fragrance. At this price, you can buy other vanilla-forward fragrances (or even a strong body wash/lotion) that can give you the same feel as this. $400 for a 50ml is expensive and while I love TF fragrances, this is a hard sell at that price. Would I recommend this? Yes as it is good to me but I strongly suggest sampling this at the local Sephora as it might not be good for you. $400 is way too high to do a blind buy.

reviews.review_title: A strong vanilla fragrance, perfect for layering
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I want to start of by saying the packaging is beautiful. It's simple yet classy. The vanilla scent is very powerful, the first thing you smell when you spray it. As it wears longer you can notice some Sandle Wood and Almond notes. The vanilla definitely gives me some cozy vibes. It is long lasting especially on sweaters. The only downside is the vanilla is very strong and you may want to mix it or layer it with another perfume to remove some of the strong scent and balance it off. If you're a massive fan of vanilla this fragrance is for you.   *I received this fragrance Vanilla Sex product for free from Influenster and Tom Ford as a part of an incentivized campaign. In exchange for my honest review and complimentary testing purposes*

reviews.review_title: L O V E in a bottle
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging was spectacular. The smell? D I V I N E. I want to literally bathe in it. I love how 2 sprays go a long day and for perspective I work 12 hours day and I constantly get compliments that I smell very nice. This is definitely a luxury product that I will cherish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you like vanilla and almond you will love this but i definitely don’t think it’s a safe blind buy. I personally love it and it layers well with a lot of my other fragrances. And the bottle is gorgeous

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this perfume from Influenster to give my honest opinion and review.  It smells amazing. I'm not a huge fragrance person because they usually trigger migraines. I tested it over a few weeks, increasing the amount I would wear. This one, however, isn't, and hasnt triggered one thus far. I can wear it all fay at work, sweating and unloading trucks, at the end of the day i could still smell.the perfume. The vanilla smell is a bit strong, but pleasant. It has hints of almond and spice, so for someone who loves baking (like myself), it is an excellent scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is NOT a safe blind buy. As a vanilla girlie, I thought this would be an amazing scent/addition to my collection. I finally decided to use it yesterday and I almost wish I didn’t spray it. I saw someone else say that it smells like play-doh and I cannot agree more. I will be returning is asap rocky

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The bottle and packaging of this is super nice and will be a very nice addition to my perfume shelf. As for the scent, I do like it and have received compliments on it when wearing it. I’m not a huge fan of a pure vanilla scent so it won’t be my go to, but I will definitely use it from time to time

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this fragrance. It’s a no for me. I smell notes of Musk and hints of Play-Doh.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Negative 5 star! Worse Tom Tord Fragrance! I had high hopes! Thankfully, I didn’t blind buy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I sprayed this on in store with the intention of getting it but it did not work with my skin chemistry. On my skin it smells like straight up vanilla extract even the alcohol note too i think it was because of the sandalwood, for others they might've liked it but for me I could not find a focal point or the main focus of this perfume yes it smells good but nothing too special can be said

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This smells like a super clean porta potty. I love the packaging and I tried SO hard to like this fragrance but once I associated that scent memory… DONE.

reviews.review_title: An explosion of long lasting vanilla.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love Tom Ford fragrances and scents like Oud Wood and black orchid are classics that GOATS in my book. However Vanilla Sex is not for me. It claims to be unisex but I think unless your an older person who like feminine fragrances this is not the scent to choose. It is a very floral and sweet  vanilla that lingers in the air. It is very long lasting as far as wear and stayed on my skin into the evening and I could still smell traces after showering. It’s a Tom Ford fragrance so you know you’re getting quality lasting ingredients.
This product is good if you like vanilla. It is not my ideal scent, but I would see how somebody may like it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a complimentary bottle of this perfume in exchange for my honest review.  At first I wasn’t sure what to make of this perfume, but after using it for a few days I fell in love with it.  It smells amazing on me.  It is mostly a mature vanilla scent with a hint of almond underneath.  I took away one star because the scent only lasts for a couple of hours and I feel that at this price range it should last longer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Tried a sample in the store and this scent almost smells identical to the Drybar signature scent after I get my hair done!  Still testing the wear but I ended up googling drybar products scent and it states “jasmine, sandalwood and Madagascar vanilla.

reviews.review_title: Mildly sweet and luxurious vanilla scent
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: As soon as you spray you get like a mildly sweet vanilla essence scent that gives a hint of almond as well. It sets pretty nicely and gives a soft powdery vanilla smell in the end. Not sure how to explain it but it smells like a freshly baked almond cookies but it’s good

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Vanilla Sex is warm and inviting. This is a beautiful fragrance and one of Tom Ford’s best! I definitely don’t love all of his fragrances but this one is a stunner. It’s sensual, enticing, and long lasting. It beautiful on its own, but is also gorgeous layered with other parfum’s. I will definitely continue wearing this.  It comes from the Amber family. Fragrance notes include: Vanilla Tincture India, Vanilla Absolute, and Sandalwood Essence.

reviews.review_title: First experience with House of Tom Ford
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this fragrance complimentary from Influenster and Tom Ford for my honest review. Firstly, the packaging and presentation of this fragrance is so luxurious! Beautifully creamy beige bottle in a matching box. The presentation is what I would expect from a luxury brand. The scent itself is perfection in the mid and dry down. Long lasting on my skin and clothing. It isn't heady or over-powering, but it is a signature scent that others will notice but won't be offended by. I gave it a four only because there is something in the top that tickles my nose initially that I usually sneeze once. I don't know what it is, but I can definitely overlook that and recommend this to anyone who has a budget for a sophisticated, sexy vanilla fragrance. It is a crowd pleaser but also a unique vanilla.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This. Smells. Amazing. The initial hit smells like vanilla extract lol but then it softens and dries down to smell light and sweet. The bottle is also absolutely beautiful! I love the opaque cream color of it. That said, this smells very similar to an inexpensive viral TikTok perfume. But the quality is unmatched. The other one does not last on the skin and the smell changes after a while and you have to reapply. This perfume gives off scent all day. Those saying you can get other less expensive scents that are similar are probably correct, but you are not getting the quality of the TF one. The quality of this investment is better than my other less expensive vanilla scents. I’m not sure the issue with those saying it does not last but it lasted on my skin throughout my work day. I received compliments on it first time I wore it out. Someone actually leaned in and smelled me lol. I’d worn a cardigan days earlier with the TF scent and it was still on there when I put in on later in the week. I didn’t even reapply. It just smelled light and nice. Love it!

reviews.review_title: Do not buy this at Sephora
reviews.review_text: I literally JUST bought this and was so excited after spraying it in the store I opened in the car. And it was a completely different scent inside!!! Someone had to have switched it because there is no way this is what I sprayed in the store. Super disappointing wow DISA

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve tried other Tom Ford fragrances and didn’t really get the hype for the price, but this one smells SO good! I’m a vanilla / gourmand fan in fragrances, and this one hits that vanilla note without being too sweet or cloying and it only smells better as it dries down. It makes me want to try other Tom Ford vanilla scents like Tobacco Vanille next.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I had my hopes up for this fragrance as soon as I heard about it. Ordered it asap and I am so disappointed. It smells like play-do.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not a huge fan of this scent. I was excited with it being vanilla based but it has a spicier musk smell, often described as sour from other reviewers, that may not preferred for gourmand lovers.

reviews.review_title: Musk needs to be listed as a main accord
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Yo! If you amp musk and don’t like musk do not buy this. There’s a lot of hype but all I can smell is mostly vanilla and musk like a lot. It ain’t vanilla sex that’s for sure it’s dirty. It’s been about 30 min and I’m thinking I should just wash it off

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i LOVE this scent. it’s different than any other vanilla scent i’ve really smelled in my opinion it smells like a true vanilla it’s strong but not overbearing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is straight-up fire! 🌋 It's like this smooth blend of creamy vanilla, orchid, and amber that's just pure seduction. 🔥 You spray it on, and suddenly you're feeling all kinds of confident and sexy. 💃 The vanilla in this thing is no joke – it's like a sweet and rich vibe that screams luxury. 💯 If you're looking to smell expensive and turn heads, this is the move. 💋💼 Vanilla Sex is legit the secret weapon for those nights when you wanna be dripping in sensuality and leaving a trail of allure behind you. 👌✨

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This smells heavenly on me. Like a rich mature vanilla, probably from the sandalwood. Not too sweet, and it lasts especially if you put a dab of Vaseline on your wrists. Most perfumes don’t smell that great on me (ex. Replica’s coffee break smells like hairspray on me), but I lucked out with this one. If your chemistry works well with gourmands try this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this in exchange for my honest review. This unisex scent is perfect. I like it more and more as I wear it throughout the day. My husband even likes it and he doesn’t like anything. It’s vanilla with a hint of woodsy and it’s perfect!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in exchange for my review. I was very excited to receive this product, and this perfume didn’t let me down. At first spray, you can pick up the almond scent, which I personally love and I wish it stayed longer. It then settles to a warm vanilla with a bit of maturity. It’s not overly gourmand. The sandalwood really grounds it so it never becomes sickeningly sweet. I think this perfume is unisex with a lean towards feminine; however, a man could feel comfortable wearing this if he isn’t looking for a heavily masculine scent. I personally have a hard time smelling this on myself after a few hours, but I tend to go nose blind to my perfumes. Other people have commented on it after several hours of wear, and I have noticed being able to smell it on fabrics a few days later so its longevity seems good. I have a large perfume collection and I would absolutely buy this perfume (while crying a little about the cost).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from Influenster and Tom Ford in exchange for my honest opinion and review. Vanilla, almond, with a powdery slightly floral touch is how I would describe this scent. Nothing earth shattering, but a solid vanilla scent that is very pleasant without being too much of a room filler. I personally prefer vanille fatale over this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’m not really a fan of this scent. It smells strong and spicy. It takes awhile to get use to once it’s on. I didn’t love it and kinda wished I didn’t spray it on. I was expecting something softer since it was vanilla.

Soo glad I did not blind buy this one. Tried it in Sephora yesterday & it was HORRIBLE. Not worth the price at all. I’m sure the vanilla sprays at BBW smell much better. I opted for the KAYALI Vanilla 28 & am in love.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free in exchange for my HONEST review. This is seriously one of the best fragrances I have ever used. Sweet but still has some woody tones to it. The scent lasts ALL day!! Constantly getting compliments on it and the packaging is gorgeous as always with Tom Ford. I do find it to be a more feminine scent but it is the best in my opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Tom Ford Vanilla Sex is a warm, sweet, fresh scent that I absolutely love! My husband even commented on how good it smelled. The packaging was equally impressive right  down to the tissue paper! This is definitely a high end fragrance and the price reflects that but if you’re like me who wears occasionally and sparingly it should last for awhile. I don’t purchase or wear fragrance often due to sensitivity but this one did not cause any headaches or reactions. I would highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The fragrance itself is a heady, intoxicating vanilla floral that is beautifully rounded out with sandalwood. It’s purely delicious and addictive. I got compliments galore from my husband and coworkers when I wore this to our employee holiday party. I love the tongue in cheek name of this as it is very fitting. It may be vanilla but is a unique, well done vanilla that is true to the Tom Ford brand. I also love that there are four different kinds of vanilla in this. I am so happy and beyond thrilled to have received a bottle as I am an avid perfume collector and lover! It felt like Christmas came early when I unboxed this beauty! Thank you so much!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The smell did have a mixture of vanilla, sandalwood, and almond create a harmonious and captivating fragrance that is both inviting and sophisticated, appealing to those who appreciate a well-balanced, multi-dimensional scent experience. Overall im really impressed

reviews.review_title: Try it out in store first
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Agree with some of the other reviews re: refraining from blind buying this. I stumbled upon this today in my local Sephora and the scent was just not it for me..bummer bc I love vanilla perfumes. This one is very musky, mature, and not what I was expecting from TF. IMO there are much better vanilla perfume options from Kayali, Phlur, and others.   Would highly recommend stopping in store to try first!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Tom Ford's Vanilla Sex fragrance is a captivating blend of sweet vanilla and warm almond notes. The scent is alluring and sensual, making it a perfect choice for those who appreciate a touch of sweetness with a hint of sophistication. The vanilla is rich and indulgent, while the almond adds a subtle nuttiness that enhances the overall complexity. It's a fragrance that exudes warmth and sensuality, making it a delightful addition to any collection for those who crave a unique and inviting scent

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this instantly because I thought it was going to be a cozy almond-y vanilla dream but it smells more of a powdery- vanilla to me. It’s like granny vanilla. Disappointing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Not a safe blind buy! I really wanted to like this but I do not. It’s smells like root beer and cream soda and it lasts maybe 2 hours on your skin. Save your money…there are way better vanilla scents.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The name says it all! This fragrance is sweet and sexy! Perfect for a romantic dinner. Tmvery long-lasting and the bottle look expensive and packaging overall exquisite.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was sent this perfume from Ibotta to try in exchange for a review.  The pros: Beautiful packaging. Scent is nice and inoffensive.  The cons: The scent sometimes comes off as Vanilla Extract, which if you like that, you will love this perfume. Even though I like vanilla, I don’t necessarily want to smell like I spilled something on me while I was baking.  Overall: This may make a nice gift for someone or for yourself if you really like vanilla, but it’s too close to vanilla extract for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is an amaretto scent . It is Very weak in performance . Do not buy into the hype of the YouTubers/influencers . It’s not worth $400+ . There are other vanillas out there that perform better for a fraction of cost!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This scent is so perfect! I love vanilla perfumes but this one is so sophisticated. It definitely smells luxurious and expensive. I have a poor sense of smell and I can still smell this on me after hours of wearing. This is my new special occasion perfume!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: not bad but not vanilla. was very hopefully for an amazing warm scent but all i could smell was cherry and almond, not good

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I did not like this. I love gourmands, but this ain’t it. I would not blind buy. I think Bianco Latte is a way better gourmand vanilla than this.

reviews.review_title: A beautiful scent that doesn’t last
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This scent is beautiful it smells like musky vanilla in a warm inviting way. However. It lasts for maybe an hour or two and then disappears from the skin. I would adore this scent if it lasted longer but I find myself reaching for other scents that I know are longer lasting and just as beautiful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: If you like the smell of Disaronno then you’re going to love this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Smells very cheap and artificial. I got a headache immediately ! Save your money w this one!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love it! Got it as a gift. I’m not sure what the reviews are talking about. I feel like I smell like a grown sexy cookie!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This smells so bad I had to roll the windows down after testing it. :/

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is terrible. I dont smell vanilla at all. It reminds me of a bathroom spray. Returning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’m usually not a big vanilla scent person, however this fragrance form Tom ford is elegant with almond to enhance the vanilla note. Light but long lasting, warm and pairs beautifully with other fragrances.   Definitely recommend this elevated fragrance for any vanilla lovers! Great for the colder months.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Very disappointed with the smell. It smell like a cherry  restroom spray. I don’t like it at all. Sprayed it on my skin to see if maybe with time it could settle better, but no unfortunately I’m returning this. ￼

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Agree with not listening to the incentivized reviews. Of course if you get a $300+ fragrance for free you’re going to say good things. I bought the small bottle for 20 percent off and still will be returning.  It opens with a strong note of the green bitter almond then changes to a more powdery note on me, with a hint of an animalic/musky note. Only a few hours later do I get a nearly pure vanilla scent but the fragrance is close to completely worn off by then. Smells like a drugstore to mid-range fragrance and definitely not worth the price.  But because it’s new and TF I predict every 20-30 something girl in every Vegas nightclub will be taking a break from Santal 33 (thank god) and drenching themselves in this for the next few months.  Btw there are more trustworthy comments from dedicated fragrance review sites (google it).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: To start the bottle is stunning, very trendy with the nudes.The opening is almost medicinal. Once it dries down I can definitely smell more of the sandalwood, it’s very well balanced between the vanilla and sandalwood. It’s not super sweet , cozy everyday fragrance .I was generous when I initially sprayed it because usually Tom Fords aren’t long lasting on me. The projection is ok for the first 5 hours. After I can barely smell it. I perfer my fragrances to be more loud. If you’re looking for a subtle vanilla powdery fragrance than give this a shot. It’s not terrible just not my preference

reviews.review_title: Nutty Sex Would Have Been More Appropriate
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dark skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a lovely scent for those who enjoy a huge presence of bitter almond. I would not consider this a vanilla fragrance, it's more almond with a hint of vanilla in the dry down. Projection is moderate and longevity is longer than expected. I'd say about 7 hours. For those looking for TF vanilla fragrance..Metallique (cupcake vanilla) and Vanilla Fatale (deep spicy vanilla that lasts forever). If you don't mind heavy almond notes  like an almond dessert you will love this but if you're looking for a simple gourmand vanilla then you might want to try others I recommended. Test for yourself and maybe it will come off differently on your skin.

reviews.review_title: Not enough vanilla or sex, too much powdery floral
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I need to try this multiple times before I could give it a review, although it’s slowly growing on me. At first spray, I was caught off guard by how strong the floral and almond was. It was so strong I couldn’t smell too much vanilla, which is the part I was excited about, with sandalwood. It also smelled so powdery I was getting a headache. I’ve been spraying it on my skin and when I put my shirt on, it softens the notes that are too harsh for me. When it dries down and the day goes on, I love how warm and vanilla it smells on me and my clothes! It’s subtle which I can appreciate but a little too subtle you’d have to be sniffing me while hugging me to smell it. Even on myself, I’d need to be moving around to smell it. Maybe I need to spray more? But it’d make me dizzy when I first spray it if I do any more! I will continue to wear this for certain days only because of the vanilla smell later on, but I would not recommend this unless you love powdery florals! If you like vanilla, you won’t get the vanilla until you have to sit through the harsh initial fragrance. On another note, absolutely love the beautiful packaging, as usual, from Tom Ford.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have NEVER gotten as many complements before about a sent as I have since I started wearing this. Typically I am not one for vanilla but this vanilla is soft and not overbearing. A very cozy sent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Tom Ford Vanilla Sex perfume offers a seductive blend of warmth and sensuality. The vanilla notes are rich and luxurious, creating an alluring and intimate fragrance. It’s a sophisticated choice for those who appreciate a sweet, yet not overpowering, scent. The longevity is commendable, staying with you throughout the day or night. However, the price point may be a consideration for some. Overall, if you’re a fan of vanilla-based fragrances and desire an indulgent, distinctive scent, Tom Ford’s Vanilla Sex is a captivating choice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume has a very heavy vanilla fragrance with a hint of something warm and spicy in the undertones. There is nothing subtle about it and the fragrance lingers even after the wearer has left the room, so only one spray will suffice. You really need to be a lover of the sweet smell of vanilla if you choose to wear this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I agree with a lot of other reviewers to not trust the influencers on this one. I really thought this being vanilla with almond hint and Tom ford would be a safe blind buy. I’m glad I was able to use the 20% sale to take $50 off, but I feel like I wasted my money. This smells so fake and I don’t pick up the almond hint at all, which was why I bought it. My local store never has TF out on display, so I knew I would have to order online. If you want to try this and can’t sample in a store, definitely save yourself some money and buy a sample online somewhere first.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This exquisite vanilla scent is an extraordinary fusion of warmth and comfort. Cozy, sesual, sweater weather in a bottle.  Vanilla Sex is a lovely fall/winter scent. The top note of almond is very heavy to start almost too much so, however once the fragrance dries down, the almond mellows out and swirls into a beautiful blend of rich, comforting vanillas, earthy sandalwood and sweet, soft amber.  This scent is long lasting, mysterious and sexy and makes you feel luxurious.    The bottle is glamorous and modern in appearance.  An absolutely stunning addition to any vanity. The inside a milky opaque shade with the bottle being an elegant gold. It conveys opulence without being tacky or gaudy.  Another stunning fragrance from Tom Ford.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product from influenster in exchange for my honest opinion of the product. This luxury perfume packs a big punch. The smell is not overwhelming but does last throughout the day. The consistency of the perfume is a little different than others, a tad thicker.  I love this light vanilla smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this Tom Ford Fragrance free from Influenster/ Tom Ford in exchange for my honest review. First thing,I want to mention is that the smell is so elegant and vanilla. It is not a strong scent where it smells too much like vanilla, but it has a light touch that is enough to have on your skin, which is why I really enjoy it. I found the look of it also very elegant and pretty. It’s clear with a light beige look to it. It over all looks elegant from the packaging to the overall perfume look and smell it has. I went out with my boyfriend and my friends and they all found it sweet and fresh vanilla scent nice. It’s definitely luxurious and elegant which is what I like about it too. Tom Ford never fails to amaze me with their products.  I definitely recommend anyone to really try it, never know if it’s the right scent for you.

reviews.review_title: please don’t be tricked by influencers…
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This smells like playdough. I tested it in store and neither my boyfriend or the Sephora employee stocking next to us had anything nice to say about this fragrance.  It genuinely smells exactly like

Was expecting so much from this release. Unfortunately returned the same day I received it; if I could describe it blatantly: Smells like spoiled moist butt. At first it was like a powdery old person, then started to smell funky. Hard pass

reviews.review_title: The worst initial smell in a fragrance
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The WORST initial smelling perfume I have ever smelled. I enjoy smelling and rating different fragrances, so I have smelled a ton. I can honestly say that I've never sprayed a fragrance and needed to cover it up with something else-- this was that one. It's almost similar to a bad cough syrup, spicy, not creamy for a vanilla scent AT ALL.  To give this fragrance the credit it deserves, however, the dry down is quite pleasant. I scrubbed my wrists with hand sanitizer in my car immediately after to get the awful smell off of me, but even through that, the scent lasted. I find myself 5 hours later catching wiffs and actually liking it more and more. Is it worth over $300? Absofreakinglutely not! Any fragrance that takes 5 hours to smell good is not worth a penny! So disappointing, as I love vanilla and was so thrilled about this one!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Missed the mark for me. It doesn’t stink but it doesn’t smell good to me. Smells like a very dry vanilla. I’m simply not a fan of it and I usually like Tom Ford perfumes. Luckily, this one was free from Influenster in exchange for my review. My advice would be to smell it before you buy it.

reviews.review_title: A must have in my routine ￼
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product over the past few weeks, I am loving the results! It has helped keep my dry skin feeling hydrated..

reviews.review_title: Vanilla Sex is Anthony but traditional/boring
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this free for my honest review. This is the vanilla scent I have been waiting for! Vanilla Sex is anything but boring. Sensual, strong scent of true vanilla with a definite hint of almond and a hint of floral. It’s intoxicatingly delicious. At first, I thought of freshly baked cookies but as the day goes by, it’s subtle and more simple vanilla goodness, not too cookie-sweet. Tom Ford’s site says that vanilla tincture India was created specifically for Vanilla Sex. Bravo Tom Ford…you’ve made Vanilla Sex something that everyone can wear, and feel sexy and powerful. Perfect for winter, and fabulous any time of year. I don’t see myself ever getting sick of wearing this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product thru Influenster - I noticed there are mixed reviews about this product but I truly loved it. It’s such a warm vanilla smell which is absolutely perfect for this time of the year. It is a strong and long lasting scent but it’s not overbearing. You definitely don’t need much for it to be noticeable

reviews.review_title: Should be called Almond Sex not Vanilla
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I couldn’t wait to get this & wanted to love it. Was hoping for a strong vanilla but could only smell almond. If you want almond you might like it. I returned it. Bottle is gorgeous, but would not suggest blind buying this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Don’t trust the influencers on this one!I I ordered Tom Ford Vanilla Sex after reading and watching the reviews. They have lied to us. Disappointment on so many levels. Smells like mixing vanilla with baby powder. Nothing sexy

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this from Tom Ford and Influenster in exchange for my review.  I love this scent! It is the perfect vanilla scent for me. The bottle is very pretty and sprays well. Devotion was supposed to be my winter signature scent but since I got Vanilla Sex, I've worn it every day! The only downside is that it doesn't last very long, which at this price point is very disappointing.

reviews.review_title: Not for the feint of heart
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Ok, so I've been blessed to try a few of Tom Fords line. Keep em coming! This particular scent is not for the feint of heart! It's BOLD. The staying power is also very noteworthy. A little (and I mean a little) goes a very long way. If your not careful it can be overpowering. The vanilla scent does knock your socks off when done right though. It's a really freaking good smell. If you like vanilla that is. I do not prefer wearing this everyday though. For me, this is for special occasions & nights out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from influenster and Tm Ford in exchange for my honest review! Thank you for giving me  this opportunity to try this amazing product! This Fragrance Addictive by nature and glamorous by design, a captivating interplay of deep and bright vanilla notes stars in Vanilla Sex. It’s an unforgettable experience and an icon of sensual pleasure that’s far from innocent. Vanilla Tincture India, an ingredient created specifically for Vanilla Sex, exudes a soft sensuality. Vanilla reveals a pristine glamour, warmed by mysterious florals and bitter almond essence. A timeless sandalwood quality mingles with enticing tonka absolute and an exquisite Ultravanil\ molecule. This fragrance is an elegant bottle! Featuring opaque, cream-colored inner lacquering, a honey-tinted outer layer, and a caramel-hued plaque, the Private Blend bottle is an extravagant monument for any vanity/grooming area.  It is a luxury fragrance from Tom Ford! I spary it, Warm & Sweet Gourmands, Vanilla Tincture, Vanilla Absolute, Sandalwood! So lovely scent! So amazing! Just after spary this fragrance for a few minutes! It become very light smell and comfortable. I like that smell! Not too sweet!  Love that smell! The scent smell awesome! It lasting all day long!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: at first the scent has an underlying note that i cannot stand but once it finally dries down it is addictive. i also love that the scent itself is unisex so it literally smells good on everyone. definitely a strong almond vanilla cupcake scent. tom ford never fails with the luxurious packaging. definitely long lasting as well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got this perfume from Influenster to try, it has a strong vanilla warm cozy scent. It has a strong scent that lasted it all day. I gave it 4 stars just because it was too vanilla for me, but if that's what you like I would recommend it. The bottle is beautiful!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance is very interesting. It transforms throughout the day as you wear it. It’s starts out more woody and gets sweeter as the day goes on. I love vanilla and this smells so luxe.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Overall it’s a good perfume. I wouldn’t say it’s amazing but it lives up to its name! The vanilla scent is very heavy on me at first but after it wears off it’s very pretty and people will definitely smell you when you walk into a room. In my opinion it’s a very feminine scent so it’s hard for me to see it as gender neutral. Overall good if you love vanilla but if not definitely stay away.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Tom Ford has done it again. They have made the perfect vanilla perfume! The scent reminds me of a cozy winter day. The longevity of the scent lasted about 2 days for me. I would definitely recommend this perfume to vanilla lovers.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Nothing special. It’s giving very light vanilla and cinnamon on me, which isn’t what I was hoping for. With all the hype I was expecting so much more. My first time being disappointed w/ TF

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this on Influenster in exchange for my honest review. The opening is very Almond, I was looking for a gourmand type of vanilla but instead I get vanilla pod if that makes sense. The dry down is very prominent in the extract vanilla scent. It lasted around 8 hours on me. Projection was very minimal.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells ok, poor performance. Opens more with almond note, but you catch the vanilla in the dry down. Zero projection or scent trail, but you can smell it on your clothes all day if you really, really overspray and sniff closely. Need to layer it with a vanilla based perfume oil to boost longevity. Overpriced with worse performance than a drug store body spray, but it smells good and elevated. Perhaps a cozy scent for an intimate night in, but for the price it’s really not worth the investment.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t understand the hype. Smells cheap its too strong and sweet. Didn’t like it at all. Will be returning it.

reviews.review_title: Never trusting an incentivized review again
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Just got this in the mail today and will be returning it tomorrow. Is the vanilla in the room with us?? I stayed up until 3am for the Sephora app exclusive release, just to get baby powder in a bottle…..

reviews.review_title: If you are a Vanilla Lover …
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: For the vanilla/gourmand lovers. It’s basic yet NOT basic. How does that make sense? This is vanilla, nutty, slightly spicy, creamy, almond, whipped, powdery, rice note, lactonic. I don’t regret it at all!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am absolutely in love. The smell of vanilla all day is my most favorite part. It is a long lasting perfume that makes me feel sexy. I love the bottle color it's perfect for the smell. I don't have to use a lot to get the job done. That means I have more times days to use it. If your a vanilla lover this will be your new favorite smell. My husband loves the way I smell and my friends are asking what is that perfume your you have on.  It smell amazing.

reviews.review_title: A must have Tom Ford Fragrance
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've sampled quite a few and own a few Tom Fords, so the quality here is nothing new to me. Very smooth unisex fragrance, that has a bit of sweetness up top with vanilla. It can lean slightly feminine depending on your skin, but definitely makes a superb woman's scent. Classy, sweet, and wonderfully blended. 8 out of 10 for Scent appeal, and 9 out of 10 for longevity, with around 8ish hours. Check this one out if you haven't yet, and I thank Influenster for sending this and incentivizing me to write this post

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Disappointed - reminded me of the smell of a school bathroom with cheap soap

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This smells like a sexy grown up version of a vanilla fragrance. It smells really delicious/ intoxicating and is perfect for a date night. Removing a star because the price is pretty steep but overall a nice fragrance to splurge on. Also the bottle is beautiful! For

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m rarely let down by Tom ford fragrances and this is no exception. It was a nice deep, slightly nutty vanilla with a nighttime vibe to it, and the performance was great as well with moderate projection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you’re not wanting to buy blind, I found the scent is almost exactly the same as the tree hut vanilla sugar scrub. Sort of the spring/summer sister scent to the more fall/winter-y tobacco vanille.

reviews.review_title: Vanilla cake with a hint of almond
reviews.review_text: Bought this day it came out as I already have a few Tom ford perfumes. Sent it back. Smells like cake or vanilla extract. Did not like at all. For the money I want something that smells wow. Not like I just came out of the I've.

reviews.review_title: I must have if you love vanilla sent.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: After using this sent for a few days, I have come to the conclusion that this is a great vanilla sent to wear occasionally. It is on the sweet side of things as it reminds me of a plain vanilla cake with icing. It does have premium qualities within the scent as most Tom Ford products do, so if you are interested Van that lasts all day on your skin. I would suggest this product for you. I personally will be wearing it about one time a week due to the sweet aroma and I will be letting my friends know about this to purchase also.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I blind bought this perfume because of all the raving reviews; however, I was highly disappointed. I love vanilla scents but this was not it. The scent overall is just overwhelming and I did not get any hints of vanilla to my liking. For me personally, I would not wear it, returned immediately.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Tom Ford fragrance is the epitome of glamour and this doesn’t disappoint! I absolutely love scents strong with sandalwood and tonka (think Jo Malone’s myrrh and tonka). This scent is right up there with my all time favorites!
it’s so stinky omg. while i’m not a fan of spices, i love vanilla. there’s just too much spice for me, smells like hot butt

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So complex and distinguished! I especially love how the bitter almond wraps all the other notes together. I’m usually not even crazy about vanilla scents but this one is just so exquisite, it’s going to be my new signature scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Tom Ford's Vanilla Sex is an intoxicating gourmand that leaves a luxurious trail of caramel, vanilla bean, and spice. It's warm, decadent, and oh-so-seductive, clinging to your skin like a whispered promise. Performance is stellar, but be warned: this fragrance leans heavily feminine. Think dessert drizzled with honey, not a rugged campfire. If you're comfortable embracing the sweet side, Vanilla Sex is an unforgettable experience. Just prepare for compliments (and maybe a few raised eyebrows). 4 out of 5 stars, minus one for the femme fatale vibes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m vanilla baby! Perfect timing to release this fragrance since Jack Harlow’s song came out last month haha   I’m enjoying this perfume. It’s not too heavy but does have a bold vanilla scent. I’ve wore it alone but also have been having fun coming up with layering combos.   I’m e

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Spoiled vanilla yogurt mixed with flowers is the best way I can describe it. The vanilla tincture note is really noticeable. If you've ever smelled vanilla tincture or extract straight from the bottle, then you know it doesn't smell as good as it does when it's mixed. If you love vanilla, don't let the name and notes of this fragrance fool you into thinking this is a safe blind buy because it is NOT. I suggest trying it in store first.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Purchased this fragrance with my own money. The packaging is beautiful, however I don’t believe it is worth the high price tag. Initially, strong almond scent , once it dries down the vanilla comes out. Not long lasting at all, would have to mix it with another fragrance to actually enjoy it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had been looking for the perfect vanilla fragrance and the Tom Ford Vanilla Sex does not disappoint! It’s a soft and sophisticated vanilla scent. The vanilla is creamy with a hint of sweet and nutty almond. There’s an added warmth and earthiness from the notes of sandalwood that really balances the sweetness creating a more mature vanilla fragrance. I’m in love with this perfume and I can’t recommend it enough!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: For as long as I can remember, I have always gravitated towards vanilla scents. This perfume is a very mature vanilla fragrance, both sophisticated and sexy.  Just a little bit lingers on my skin the entire day.  I would recommend this perfume to any vanilla lovers, and I think it's a perfect year-round scent.  I received this product as a free sample.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Very disappointed, I was excited because of the package. Just like some honest review said, first alcohol smell and then almond and mixed with a bad vanilla milk. It’s going to return for sure.
